FourStepProcess.title: Cool inflammation with Clinically Proven Ingredients

items.title: Don’t Boost. Balance
items.body: “Boosting” your immune system has unintended consequences
items.expanded: Our immune system is designed to seek and destroy pathogens, but boosting your system to respond to pathogens outside of a healthy range can throw your body into overdrive, causing a cytokine storm and potentially causing long-term or even life-threatening damage.  Instead of boosting, Riboflam’s clinically-proven ingredients focus on balance. A balanced immune response does not over or underreact to invaders-instead, it activates a measured, proportional response.

items.title: Ultra-Bioavailability
items.body: New technology rewrites the rules of bioavailability
items.expanded: Our bodies have evolved to view beneficial plant-based polyphenols as useless or dangerous. For this reason, nutrients that help manage inflammation, like curcumin, are blocked by your gut before they can enter your bloodstream. No matter how much curcumin you take, the benefits are minimal without new Phytosome Technology used by Bruno MD.  Phytosome uses biomimicry to wrap polyphenols in a fatty lipid, like a delivery truck. With the curcumin molecule hidden inside, the lipid passes through the gut and into your bloodstream with 3000% more bioavailability. As a result, Phytosome sets the new standard in prescription-grade natural ingredients.

items.title: Coactive Health
items.body: A breakthrough formulation of ingredients: all-natural, and clinically proven
items.expanded: Bruno MD formulates Riboflam with three coactive elements that work powerfully together.   Phytosome Complex helps regulate inflammation and balance the immune system with four unique Phytosome deliverables: Curcumin, Echinacea, Boswellia and Quercetin Phyotosome.  Nucleotides Yeast Extracts help white blood cells called lymphocytes  respond to pathogens.  Astaxanthin is a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant; active in at least five different inflammation pathways to help maintain a balanced immune system and provide protection to cells from damaging free-radicals.

items.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
items.body: Bruno MD uses Ingredients tested and endorsed by top research and medical institutions
items.expanded: All ingredients in Bruno MD products are clinically-proven and backed by hundreds of studies. One example is Curcumin; the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.

Curcumin is a member of the diarylheptanoid class of natural products (curcuminoids) derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant, commonly called turmeric. Curcumin is the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.  Turmeric and has been used for thousands of years in Southeast Asia, China, and India for cooking and medicinal uses. Curcumin Phytosome is clinically proven in 35 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, published clinical trials to promote a healthy inflammatory response, boost immune response, and provide relief from exercise-related pain.   It works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body. The extract has been standardized and contains the full bouquet of curcuminoids, not just curcumin (Curcuminoids are polyphenolic pigments and include 77% curcumin, 17% demethoxycurcumin, and 3% bisdemethoxycurcumin). It is called a “Life Guardian” because it helps control chronic inflammation and boost immune response at any age.  Western scientists have rigorously tested Turmeric and its compounds for decades, including for heart disease. Results show that Turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system: (vii.193)  Prevent or delay the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. (vii.68) Protect the heart from inflammation and atherosclerosis promoted by chronic exposure to air pollution. (vii.194) Regulate or help lower high blood pressure. (vii.193, 195) Restores antioxidant levels and reduces free radical damage from toxic chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193) Improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially combined with exercise. (vii.196) Reduce heart damage caused by chronic kidney disease (by blocking free radical damage and boosting mitochondrial function). (vii.197) Help stop the formation of dangerous blood clots, including those that cause stroke. (vii.198-199) Prevent cardiac hypertrophy due to high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes. An enlarged heart can lead to heart failure and even death. (vii.193) Protects the heart from injury caused by sepsis and chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193, 200)  Turmeric’s rhizome contains potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds. Studies suggest that some of the ways turmeric compounds protect liver cells and can help prevent liver fibrosis are as follows: (vii.13)  Stimulating transcription factor proteins that prompt genes to generate natural antioxidants (such as glutathione). (vii.13) Preventing activation and growth of cells in the liver that produce excess structural components. Hepatic stellate cells (HSCs) and fibroblasts are the cells mainly involved in fibrosis. (vii.13) Suppressing inflammatory transcription factors (such as NF-κB) and cytokine proteins (such as TNF-α) that can activate HSCs directly and/or indirectly. For example, TNF-α directly blocks signals from insulin, the hormone needed to metabolize blood sugar. Impaired sugar metabolism can activate HSCs. (vii.13, 31, 279) Promoting other transcription factor proteins, such as PPAR-γ, that block the activation and proliferation of HSCs. PPAR-γ also suppresses the expression of inflammatory proteins, such as the growth factor TGF-β, that promote collagen production. (vii.13, 198) Decreasing harmful triglyceride and cholesterol deposits in the liver. (vii.279) Reducing type I collagen, the primary substance in fibrotic scar tissue in the liver produced by HSCs and fibroblasts. (vii.284)

Indian Frankincense is a botanical extract harvested from the gum resin of the Boswellia Serrata tree. Boswellia Serrata Phytosome helps govern inflammatory response in the joints, bones, respiratory airways, the bowel, and brain.   In addition, clinical studies have shown that a cocktail of AKBA (Acetyl-11-Keto-𝛃-Boswellic Acid) and curcumin significantly inhibit certain viral infections (viral entry) compared to the untreated control. BRUNO MD uses Boswellia Phytosome extract that is 400% more bioavailable than regular Boswellia.

The use of Echinacea is traced back to Native Americans who used it as a natural anti-inflammatory. Historically other uses include relief of mouth pain and toothache, treatment of the common cold and cough, tonsillitis relief, and treatment of septic diseases.   Bruno MD cultivates our coneflower from an Italian varietal. Our plants guarantee high polysaccharides and low cross-contamination between Echinacea species.   Echinacea Angustifolia Phytosome is optimized for maximum absorption. Results in clinical trials conducted using our triple-standardized Echinacea Phytosome have shown a statistically significant tendency to be more efficacious than flu vaccination alone, suggesting that E. Phytosome has the potential to act synergistically with influenza vaccination.

items.note: Nucleoflam Proprietary Nucleotides & Nucleosides Yeast Extract Complex
items.expanded: The Bruno MD formulation begins at the cellular base level with a Proprietary Nucleoflam Nucleotide & Nucleotides Yeast Extract Complex. These nucleotides are vital to maintaining essential cell functions and supporting a healthy immune system, digestive system, and brain function.   Nucleotides also enhance the anti-inflammatory activity of Vitamin C, Vitamin D3, and Zinc. They are gluten-free, vegan, kosher, and halal. BRUNO MD combines Nucleoflam with Astaxanthin, the most potent anti-inflammatory known in Nature. Together they create a powerful shield against chronic inflammation.

Astaxanthin is the most potent anti-inflammatory known in NatureNature. In addition, natural astaxanthin has clinically demonstrated the ability to balance and strengthen the immune system while enhancing antibody production. This increase in antibodies improves our bodies’ defense against inflammation and the pathogens that can make us sick.  Astaxanthin can also help reduce high blood pressure, improve heart health, prevent type II diabetes, and decrease the risk of brain damage from a stroke.  Over 95% of commercial astaxanthin is synthetic. Worse, it is harvested using petrochemicals. Bruno MD Astaxanthin is naturally derived from Haematococcus Pluvialis algae, found in temperate environments around the world to produce the highest concentrations of astaxanthin with the highest bioavailability.

Quercetin is a plant-based antioxidant that has proven benefits, including anti-Inflammation properties and the promotion of Immunity.   Quercetin is not an easy nutrient to get into your diet. To obtain just one daily dose of quercetin you’d need to eat about 100 kilos of broccoli.  Additionally, quercetin is a polyphenol which is rejected by our bodies.   Bruno MD uses Phytosome technology to bring the benefits of quercetin to every cell in your body. Research has substantiated that Quercetin Phytosome is 2000% more bioavailable than standard quercetin.   Clinical studies confirm that quercetin has strong antiviral and antiinflammatory effects. A natural immunomodulator, quercetin helps block harmful viruses and bacteria and even demonstrates anti-cancer properties.   The ultra bioavailability provided by the Phytosome delivery system also improves athletic performance and accelerates fitness recovery with quercetin’s proven anti-inflammatory properties. [43,44]  Quercetin’s anti-inflammatory potential can be expressed on different cell types, both in animal and human models [45,46,47,48,49,50,51,52,53].    It possesses both mast cell stabilizing and gastrointestinal cytoprotective activity [54] and can also play a modulating, biphasic, and regulatory action on inflammation and immunity [53].   Additionally, quercetin has an immunosuppressive effect on dendritic cell function [55].

Experts believe this healthy, active way of living could be why one of the five Blue Zones worldwide, areas where people regularly live to be over 100 years old, can be found in the Mediterranean. Blue zones like the one in Sardinia, Italy offer secrets to longevity unavailable anywhere else, and their secrets are more important now than ever as worldwide cases of heart-related diseases in women and men are at an all-time high. Bruno MD, a part of one of Italy's largest pharmaceutical companies, has worked tirelessly to harness some of the heart-supporting ingredients of these Blue Zones and the Mediterranean diet and bring them to you, no passport required. The result is the revolutionary supplement CholestQ10®

In addition to helping support healthy blood lipid levels, the flavonoids in bergamot also support vascular endothelium health, which is important for vasoconstriction, arterial responsiveness, and overall circulatory health. items.title: Specific Collagen Peptides
items.body: Create New Collagen at any age
items.expanded: Only Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to stimulate youthful collagen levels no matter your age. Specially hydrolyzed Specific Collagen Peptides, humanely sourced from trusted European suppliers, are proven to stimulate three types of collagen-producing cells in skin, bones, and joints.

items.title: All-Natural Vitamin C
items.body: Stimulates collagen biosynthesis
items.expanded: Royal Collagen Peptides contains 278% of the daily recommended value of Vitamin C, which enhances collagen biosynthesis. In addition, our Natural Vitamin C increases Type I collagen synthesis.

items.title: Red Orange Complex
items.body: Turn collagen-producing cells back on
items.expanded: RED ORANGE COMPLEX is a standardized powder extract obtained from the juice of three pigmented (Moro, Tarocco and Sanguinello) varieties of Sicilian blood orange grown exclusively in a particular area surrounding Europes most active volcano, Mt. Etna. Your skin is under constant attack by free radicals, and our Italian-sourced complex, high in phenolic compounds (anthocyanins, flavanones, and hydroxycinnamic acids) is clinically proven to protect against free radicals, enhance collagen production, and lower inflammation, turning dormant collagen-producing cells back on..

items.title: Bovine Source
items.body: Potent, Standardized & Organic
items.expanded: The Bruno MD laboratory process transforms the purest ingredients into a potent standardized powder: an organic, non-GMO, halal, and kosher-certified bovine source, raised exclusively on a plant-based diet, supplied by small European farming partners on the slopes of the Alps. Unlike farmers in the US and Brazil, cattle farmers in the European Union are prohibited from breeding genetically modified bovines or using GMO feed. Our free-range bovine source provides the full bouquet of 18 essential and non-essential amino acids.

Three clinical trials* conducted on 250 healthy females, ages 45 to 65, confirm that oral intake of Royal Collagen Specific Peptides Complex significantly reduced eye wrinkle volume by 20.1% on average and up to a maximum of 49.9% vs. the placebo group after only eight weeks of treatment.

A recent 24-week clinical trial demonstrated a pronounced improvement in brittle nails, a significant increase in nail growth rate, and decreased the frequency of cracked or chipped nails after daily oral supplementation with Royal Collagen Complex. Participants were aged from 18 to 50 and displayed at least one of the following signs of brittle nails: lamellar splitting of the free edge (lamellar peeling), edge irregularities (fissuring of the distal nail plate), and nail roughness (longitudinal ridging/grooves).

The latest Peer Reviewed, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical trial conducted on 131 postmenopausal women demonstrated that the oral intake of SCP in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly increased bone mineral density (BMD) in both the lumbar spine and the femoral neck vs the placebo group. Another double blind study carried out with approximately 100 women over a period of 3 years, concluded that bone fractures can be reduced by 75% when Royal Collagen Peptides are taken daily.

Royal Collagen Peptides reduce symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improve joint health. In the latest peer-reviewed, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical study conducted in the US, 147 athletes were recruited (75 female, 72 male). After 24 weeks, the study demonstrated that oral intake of SCP contained in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly reduced the symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improved joint health with reduced need for physiotherapy or ice packs. Another US study demonstrated that subjects with relatively mild knee Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disorders) showed changes in tibial cartilage proteoglycan concentration within a 6 month observation period.

FourStepProcess.title: Younger begins with Clinically Proven Ingredients

items.title: Specific Collagen Peptides
items.body: Create New Collagen at any age
items.expanded: Only Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to stimulate youthful collagen levels no matter your age. Specially hydrolyzed Specific Collagen Peptides, humanely sourced from trusted European suppliers, are proven to stimulate three types of collagen-producing cells in skin, bones, and joints.

items.title: All-Natural Vitamin C
items.body: Stimulates collagen biosynthesis
items.expanded: Royal Collagen Peptides contains 278% of the daily recommended value of Vitamin C, which enhances collagen biosynthesis. In addition, our Natural Vitamin C increases Type I collagen synthesis.

items.title: Red Orange Complex
items.body: Turn collagen-producing cells back on
items.expanded: RED ORANGE COMPLEX is a standardized powder extract obtained from the juice of three pigmented (Moro, Tarocco and Sanguinello) varieties of Sicilian blood orange grown exclusively in a particular area surrounding Europes most active volcano, Mt. Etna. Your skin is under constant attack by free radicals, and our Italian-sourced complex, high in phenolic compounds (anthocyanins, flavanones, and hydroxycinnamic acids) is clinically proven to protect against free radicals, enhance collagen production, and lower inflammation, turning dormant collagen-producing cells back on..

items.title: Bovine Source
items.body: Potent, Standardized & Organic
items.expanded: The Bruno MD laboratory process transforms the purest ingredients into a potent standardized powder: an organic, non-GMO, halal, and kosher-certified bovine source, raised exclusively on a plant-based diet, supplied by small European farming partners on the slopes of the Alps. Unlike farmers in the US and Brazil, cattle farmers in the European Union are prohibited from breeding genetically modified bovines or using GMO feed. Our free-range bovine source provides the full bouquet of 18 essential and non-essential amino acids.

Three clinical trials* conducted on 250 healthy females, ages 45 to 65, confirm that oral intake of Royal Collagen Specific Peptides Complex significantly reduced eye wrinkle volume by 20.1% on average and up to a maximum of 49.9% vs. the placebo group after only eight weeks of treatment.

A recent 24-week clinical trial demonstrated a pronounced improvement in brittle nails, a significant increase in nail growth rate, and decreased the frequency of cracked or chipped nails after daily oral supplementation with Royal Collagen Complex. Participants were aged from 18 to 50 and displayed at least one of the following signs of brittle nails: lamellar splitting of the free edge (lamellar peeling), edge irregularities (fissuring of the distal nail plate), and nail roughness (longitudinal ridging/grooves).

The latest Peer Reviewed, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical trial conducted on 131 postmenopausal women demonstrated that the oral intake of SCP in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly increased bone mineral density (BMD) in both the lumbar spine and the femoral neck vs the placebo group. Another double blind study carried out with approximately 100 women over a period of 3 years, concluded that bone fractures can be reduced by 75% when Royal Collagen Peptides are taken daily.

Royal Collagen Peptides reduce symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improve joint health. In the latest peer-reviewed, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical study conducted in the US, 147 athletes were recruited (75 female, 72 male). After 24 weeks, the study demonstrated that oral intake of SCP contained in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly reduced the symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improved joint health with reduced need for physiotherapy or ice packs. Another US study demonstrated that subjects with relatively mild knee Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disorders) showed changes in tibial cartilage proteoglycan concentration within a 6 month observation period.

FourStepProcess.title: Cool inflammation with Clinically Proven Ingredients

items.title: Don’t Boost. Balance
items.body: “Boosting” your immune system has unintended consequence
items.expanded: Our immune system is designed to seek and destroy pathogens, but boosting your system to respond to pathogens outside of a healthy range can throw your body into overdrive, causing a cytokine storm and potentially causing long-term or even life-threatening damage.  Instead of boosting, Riboflam’s clinically-proven ingredients focus on balance. A balanced immune response does not over or underreact to invaders-instead, it activates a measured, proportional response.

items.title: Ultra-Bioavailability
items.body: New technology rewrites the rules of bioavailability
items.expanded: Our bodies have evolved to view beneficial plant-based polyphenols as useless or dangerous. For this reason, nutrients that help manage inflammation, like curcumin, are blocked by your gut before they can enter your bloodstream. No matter how much curcumin you take, the benefits are minimal without new Phytosome Technology used by Bruno MD.  Phytosome uses biomimicry to wrap polyphenols in a fatty lipid, like a delivery truck. With the curcumin molecule hidden inside, the lipid passes through the gut and into your bloodstream with 3000% more bioavailability. As a result, Phytosome sets the new standard in prescription-grade natural ingredients.

items.title: Coactive Health
items.body: A breakthrough formulation of ingredients: all-natural, and clinically proven
items.expanded: Bruno MD formulates Riboflam with three coactive elements that work powerfully together.   Phytosome Complex helps regulate inflammation and balance the immune system with four unique Phytosome deliverables: Curcumin, Echinacea, Boswellia and Quercetin Phyotosome.  Nucleotides Yeast Extracts help white blood cells called lymphocytes  respond to pathogens.  Astaxanthin is a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant; active in at least five different inflammation pathways to help maintain a balanced immune system and provide protection to cells from damaging free-radicals.

items.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
items.body: Bruno MD uses Ingredients tested and endorsed by top research and medical institutions
items.expanded: All ingredients in Bruno MD products are clinically-proven and backed by hundreds of studies. One example is Curcumin; the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.

Curcumin is a member of the diarylheptanoid class of natural products (curcuminoids) derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant, commonly called turmeric. Curcumin is the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.  Turmeric and has been used for thousands of years in Southeast Asia, China, and India for cooking and medicinal uses. Curcumin Phytosome is clinically proven in 35 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, published clinical trials to promote a healthy inflammatory response, boost immune response, and provide relief from exercise-related pain.   It works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body. The extract has been standardized and contains the full bouquet of curcuminoids, not just curcumin (Curcuminoids are polyphenolic pigments and include 77% curcumin, 17% demethoxycurcumin, and 3% bisdemethoxycurcumin). It is called a “Life Guardian” because it helps control chronic inflammation and boost immune response at any age.  Western scientists have rigorously tested Turmeric and its compounds for decades, including for heart disease. Results show that Turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system: (vii.193)  Prevent or delay the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. (vii.68) Protect the heart from inflammation and atherosclerosis promoted by chronic exposure to air pollution. (vii.194) Regulate or help lower high blood pressure. (vii.193, 195) Restores antioxidant levels and reduces free radical damage from toxic chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193) Improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially combined with exercise. (vii.196) Reduce heart damage caused by chronic kidney disease (by blocking free radical damage and boosting mitochondrial function). (vii.197) Help stop the formation of dangerous blood clots, including those that cause stroke. (vii.198-199) Prevent cardiac hypertrophy due to high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes. An enlarged heart can lead to heart failure and even death. (vii.193) Protects the heart from injury caused by sepsis and chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193, 200)  Turmeric’s rhizome contains potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds. Studies suggest that some of the ways turmeric compounds protect liver cells and can help prevent liver fibrosis are as follows: (vii.13)  Stimulating transcription factor proteins that prompt genes to generate natural antioxidants (such as glutathione). (vii.13) Preventing activation and growth of cells in the liver that produce excess structural components. Hepatic stellate cells (HSCs) and fibroblasts are the cells mainly involved in fibrosis. (vii.13) Suppressing inflammatory transcription factors (such as NF-κB) and cytokine proteins (such as TNF-α) that can activate HSCs directly and/or indirectly. For example, TNF-α directly blocks signals from insulin, the hormone needed to metabolize blood sugar. Impaired sugar metabolism can activate HSCs. (vii.13, 31, 279) Promoting other transcription factor proteins, such as PPAR-γ, that block the activation and proliferation of HSCs. PPAR-γ also suppresses the expression of inflammatory proteins, such as the growth factor TGF-β, that promote collagen production. (vii.13, 198) Decreasing harmful triglyceride and cholesterol deposits in the liver. (vii.279) Reducing type I collagen, the primary substance in fibrotic scar tissue in the liver produced by HSCs and fibroblasts. (vii.284)

Indian Frankincense is a botanical extract harvested from the gum resin of the Boswellia Serrata tree. Boswellia Serrata Phytosome helps govern inflammatory response in the joints, bones, respiratory airways, the bowel, and brain.   In addition, clinical studies have shown that a cocktail of AKBA (Acetyl-11-Keto-𝛃-Boswellic Acid) and curcumin significantly inhibit certain viral infections (viral entry) compared to the untreated control. BRUNO MD uses Boswellia Phytosome extract that is 400% more bioavailable than regular Boswellia.

The use of Echinacea is traced back to Native Americans who used it as a natural anti-inflammatory. Historically other uses include relief of mouth pain and toothache, treatment of the common cold and cough, tonsillitis relief, and treatment of septic diseases.   Bruno MD cultivates our coneflower from an Italian varietal. Our plants guarantee high polysaccharides and low cross-contamination between Echinacea species.   Echinacea Angustifolia Phytosome is optimized for maximum absorption. Results in clinical trials conducted using our triple-standardized Echinacea Phytosome have shown a statistically significant tendency to be more efficacious than flu vaccination alone, suggesting that E. Phytosome has the potential to act synergistically with influenza vaccination.

items.note: Nucleoflam Proprietary Nucleotides & Nucleosides Yeast Extract Complex
items.expanded: The Bruno MD formulation begins at the cellular base level with a Proprietary Nucleoflam Nucleotide & Nucleotides Yeast Extract Complex. These nucleotides are vital to maintaining essential cell functions and supporting a healthy immune system, digestive system, and brain function.   Nucleotides also enhance the anti-inflammatory activity of Vitamin C, Vitamin D3, and Zinc. They are gluten-free, vegan, kosher, and halal. BRUNO MD combines Nucleoflam with Astaxanthin, the most potent anti-inflammatory known in Nature. Together they create a powerful shield against chronic inflammation.

Astaxanthin is the most potent anti-inflammatory known in NatureNature. In addition, natural astaxanthin has clinically demonstrated the ability to balance and strengthen the immune system while enhancing antibody production. This increase in antibodies improves our bodies’ defense against inflammation and the pathogens that can make us sick.  Astaxanthin can also help reduce high blood pressure, improve heart health, prevent type II diabetes, and decrease the risk of brain damage from a stroke.  Over 95% of commercial astaxanthin is synthetic. Worse, it is harvested using petrochemicals. Bruno MD Astaxanthin is naturally derived from Haematococcus Pluvialis algae, found in temperate environments around the world to produce the highest concentrations of astaxanthin with the highest bioavailability.

Quercetin is a plant-based antioxidant that has proven benefits, including anti-Inflammation properties and the promotion of Immunity.   Quercetin is not an easy nutrient to get into your diet. To obtain just one daily dose of quercetin you’d need to eat about 100 kilos of broccoli.  Additionally, quercetin is a polyphenol which is rejected by our bodies.Bruno MD uses Phytosome technology to bring the benefits of quercetin to every cell in your body. Research has substantiated that Quercetin Phytosome is 2000% more bioavailable than standard quercetin.   Clinical studies confirm that quercetin has strong antiviral and antiinflammatory effects. A natural immunomodulator, quercetin helps block harmful viruses and bacteria and even demonstrates anti-cancer properties.   The ultra bioavailability provided by the Phytosome delivery system also improves athletic performance and accelerates fitness recovery with quercetin’s proven anti-inflammatory properties. [43,44]  Quercetin’s anti-inflammatory potential can be expressed on different cell types, both in animal and human models [45,46,47,48,49,50,51,52,53].It possesses both mast cell stabilizing and gastrointestinal cytoprotective activity [54] and can also play a modulating, biphasic, and regulatory action on inflammation and immunity [53].Additionally, quercetin has an immunosuppressive effect on dendritic cell function [55].

items.title: Don’t Boost. Balance
items.body: “Boosting” your immune system has unintended consequence
items.expanded: Our immune system is designed to seek and destroy pathogens, but boosting your system to respond to pathogens outside of a healthy range can throw your body into overdrive, causing a cytokine storm and potentially causing long-term or even life-threatening damage.  Instead of boosting, Riboflam’s clinically-proven ingredients focus on balance. A balanced immune response does not over or underreact to invaders-instead, it activates a measured, proportional response.

items.title: Ultra-Bioavailability
items.body: New technology rewrites the rules of bioavailability
items.expanded: Our bodies have evolved to view beneficial plant-based polyphenols as useless or dangerous. For this reason, nutrients that help manage inflammation, like curcumin, are blocked by your gut before they can enter your bloodstream. No matter how much curcumin you take, the benefits are minimal without new Phytosome Technology used by Bruno MD.  Phytosome uses biomimicry to wrap polyphenols in a fatty lipid, like a delivery truck. With the curcumin molecule hidden inside, the lipid passes through the gut and into your bloodstream with 3000% more bioavailability. As a result, Phytosome sets the new standard in prescription-grade natural ingredients.

items.title: Coactive Health
items.body: A breakthrough formulation of ingredients: all-natural, and clinically proven
items.expanded: Bruno MD formulates Riboflam with three coactive elements that work powerfully together.   Phytosome Complex helps regulate inflammation and balance the immune system with four unique Phytosome deliverables: Curcumin, Echinacea, Boswellia and Quercetin Phyotosome.  Nucleotides Yeast Extracts help white blood cells called lymphocytes  respond to pathogens.  Astaxanthin is a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant; active in at least five different inflammation pathways to help maintain a balanced immune system and provide protection to cells from damaging free-radicals.

items.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
items.body: Bruno MD uses Ingredients tested and endorsed by top research and medical institutions
items.expanded: All ingredients in Bruno MD products are clinically-proven and backed by hundreds of studies. One example is Curcumin; the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.

Curcumin is a member of the diarylheptanoid class of natural products (curcuminoids) derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant, commonly called turmeric. Curcumin is the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.  Turmeric and has been used for thousands of years in Southeast Asia, China, and India for cooking and medicinal uses. Curcumin Phytosome is clinically proven in 35 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, published clinical trials to promote a healthy inflammatory response, boost immune response, and provide relief from exercise-related pain.   It works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body. The extract has been standardized and contains the full bouquet of curcuminoids, not just curcumin (Curcuminoids are polyphenolic pigments and include 77% curcumin, 17% demethoxycurcumin, and 3% bisdemethoxycurcumin). It is called a “Life Guardian” because it helps control chronic inflammation and boost immune response at any age.  Western scientists have rigorously tested Turmeric and its compounds for decades, including for heart disease. Results show that Turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system: (vii.193)  Prevent or delay the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. (vii.68) Protect the heart from inflammation and atherosclerosis promoted by chronic exposure to air pollution. (vii.194) Regulate or help lower high blood pressure. (vii.193, 195) Restores antioxidant levels and reduces free radical damage from toxic chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193) Improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially combined with exercise. (vii.196) Reduce heart damage caused by chronic kidney disease (by blocking free radical damage and boosting mitochondrial function). (vii.197) Help stop the formation of dangerous blood clots, including those that cause stroke. (vii.198-199) Prevent cardiac hypertrophy due to high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes. An enlarged heart can lead to heart failure and even death. (vii.193) Protects the heart from injury caused by sepsis and chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193, 200)  Turmeric’s rhizome contains potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds. Studies suggest that some of the ways turmeric compounds protect liver cells and can help prevent liver fibrosis are as follows: (vii.13)  Stimulating transcription factor proteins that prompt genes to generate natural antioxidants (such as glutathione). (vii.13) Preventing activation and growth of cells in the liver that produce excess structural components. Hepatic stellate cells (HSCs) and fibroblasts are the cells mainly involved in fibrosis. (vii.13) Suppressing inflammatory transcription factors (such as NF-κB) and cytokine proteins (such as TNF-α) that can activate HSCs directly and/or indirectly. For example, TNF-α directly blocks signals from insulin, the hormone needed to metabolize blood sugar. Impaired sugar metabolism can activate HSCs. (vii.13, 31, 279) Promoting other transcription factor proteins, such as PPAR-γ, that block the activation and proliferation of HSCs. PPAR-γ also suppresses the expression of inflammatory proteins, such as the growth factor TGF-β, that promote collagen production. (vii.13, 198) Decreasing harmful triglyceride and cholesterol deposits in the liver. (vii.279) Reducing type I collagen, the primary substance in fibrotic scar tissue in the liver produced by HSCs and fibroblasts. (vii.284)

Indian Frankincense is a botanical extract harvested from the gum resin of the Boswellia Serrata tree. Boswellia Serrata Phytosome helps govern inflammatory response in the joints, bones, respiratory airways, the bowel, and brain.   In addition, clinical studies have shown that a cocktail of AKBA (Acetyl-11-Keto-𝛃-Boswellic Acid) and curcumin significantly inhibit certain viral infections (viral entry) compared to the untreated control. BRUNO MD uses Boswellia Phytosome extract that is 400% more bioavailable than regular Boswellia.

The use of Echinacea is traced back to Native Americans who used it as a natural anti-inflammatory. Historically other uses include relief of mouth pain and toothache, treatment of the common cold and cough, tonsillitis relief, and treatment of septic diseases.   Bruno MD cultivates our coneflower from an Italian varietal. Our plants guarantee high polysaccharides and low cross-contamination between Echinacea species.   Echinacea Angustifolia Phytosome is optimized for maximum absorption. Results in clinical trials conducted using our triple-standardized Echinacea Phytosome have shown a statistically significant tendency to be more efficacious than flu vaccination alone, suggesting that E. Phytosome has the potential to act synergistically with influenza vaccination.

items.note: Nucleoflam Proprietary Nucleotides & Nucleosides Yeast Extract Complex
items.expanded: The Bruno MD formulation begins at the cellular base level with a Proprietary Nucleoflam Nucleotide & Nucleotides Yeast Extract Complex. These nucleotides are vital to maintaining essential cell functions and supporting a healthy immune system, digestive system, and brain function.   Nucleotides also enhance the anti-inflammatory activity of Vitamin C, Vitamin D3, and Zinc. They are gluten-free, vegan, kosher, and halal. BRUNO MD combines Nucleoflam with Astaxanthin, the most potent anti-inflammatory known in Nature. Together they create a powerful shield against chronic inflammation.

Astaxanthin is the most potent anti-inflammatory known in NatureNature. In addition, natural astaxanthin has clinically demonstrated the ability to balance and strengthen the immune system while enhancing antibody production. This increase in antibodies improves our bodies’ defense against inflammation and the pathogens that can make us sick.  Astaxanthin can also help reduce high blood pressure, improve heart health, prevent type II diabetes, and decrease the risk of brain damage from a stroke.  Over 95% of commercial astaxanthin is synthetic. Worse, it is harvested using petrochemicals. Bruno MD Astaxanthin is naturally derived from Haematococcus Pluvialis algae, found in temperate environments around the world to produce the highest concentrations of astaxanthin with the highest bioavailability.

Quercetin is a plant-based antioxidant that has proven benefits, including anti-Inflammation properties and the promotion of Immunity.   Quercetin is not an easy nutrient to get into your diet. To obtain just one daily dose of quercetin you’d need to eat about 100 kilos of broccoli.  Additionally, quercetin is a polyphenol which is rejected by our bodies.Bruno MD uses Phytosome technology to bring the benefits of quercetin to every cell in your body. Research has substantiated that Quercetin Phytosome is 2000% more bioavailable than standard quercetin.   Clinical studies confirm that quercetin has strong antiviral and antiinflammatory effects. A natural immunomodulator, quercetin helps block harmful viruses and bacteria and even demonstrates anti-cancer properties.   The ultra bioavailability provided by the Phytosome delivery system also improves athletic performance and accelerates fitness recovery with quercetin’s proven anti-inflammatory properties. [43,44]  Quercetin’s anti-inflammatory potential can be expressed on different cell types, both in animal and human models [45,46,47,48,49,50,51,52,53].It possesses both mast cell stabilizing and gastrointestinal cytoprotective activity [54] and can also play a modulating, biphasic, and regulatory action on inflammation and immunity [53].Additionally, quercetin has an immunosuppressive effect on dendritic cell function [55].

items.title: Shields the front of the eye
items.body: Protects the front of the eye, lens and strengthens ciliary muscles
items.expanded: Our Astaxanthin is clinically proven to help shield the front of your eyes: it’s nature’s most potent antioxidant sourced from unique algae found in temperate regions around the world. Astaxanthin protects your eyes against free radicals generated by UV radiation and strengthens eye muscles to reduce eye fatigue that contributes to Computer Vision Syndrome.

items.title: Shields the back of the eye
items.body: Protects the retina from blue light damage and oxidative stress
items.expanded: Our Lutein & Zeaxanthin combo is clinically proven to protect the back of your eyes from harmful blue light by increasing MPOD (Macular Pigment Optical Density), which naturally filters blue light before it can damage the retina, helps reduce glare, and promotes vision recovery from overexposure to fluorescent lighting and computer monitors.

items.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
items.body: Ingredients that deliver clinically proven results to ease symptoms of CVS (Computer Vision Syndrome)
items.expanded: Bluerex complex contains clinically proven ingredients with more than 120 positive and 30 placebo controlled double-blind studies: D-Alpha Tocophery to neutralize oxidation and reduce the risk of developing advanced age related macular degeneration by 25%. Bilberry Extract to help reduce dry eye by supporting healthy tears secretion with 36% anthocyanins that play an important role in improving retinal sensitivity to increase contrast and night vision. DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid) that contributes to the maintenance of normal vision. Astaxanthin to help reduce eye fatigue, increase focus recovery, and reduce itchy eyes and headaches. Lutein and Zeaxanthin to increase MPOD levels and filter macular damage from high energy blue light.

items.title: Antioxidant Protection
items.body: Protects the eye from damaging free radicals
items.expanded: To protect the front of the eye, Bluerex contains pharma-grade Astaxanthin, the most potent antioxidant in nature. Astaxanthin is stronger than other antioxidants when combating singlet oxygen damage for eye health. Singlet oxygens are active oxygen species generated in human skin by exposure to ultraviolet radiation (UV) that causes eye damage. Bluerex Astaxanthin is 6000 times stronger than Vitamin C and 3000 times more potent than Resveratrol. Bluerex protects the back of the eye from free radical damage with Lutein and Zeaxanthin, which naturally increase MPOD (Macular Optical Pigment Density) levels inside your eye. This yellow pigmentation acts like internal sunglasses to filter high-energy blue light before it hits your macula.

Natural Astaxanthin, microalgae, accumulates Astaxanthin in lipid vesicles during periods of nutrient deficiency and environmental stress. Because this alga grows in places exposed to intense sunlight during its dormant phase, it has evolved to use Astaxanthin to protect the cell nucleus against free radicals generated by UV radiation. These potent anti-inflammatory properties provide front eye protection by alleviating oxidative stress and help reduce eye fatigue and strain, common symptoms of computer vision syndrome.

These all-natural compounds are harvested from marigold flowers and dramatically increase the macular pigments critical to filtering harmful blue light before it can damage your retina. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are clinically proven partners to help reduce the progression of specific eye issues throughout our lives. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are two types of ‘carotenoids’ found in food, mainly in vegetables and fruit. They play critical antioxidant functions within our body by guarding the eyes against the damaging effects of free radicals, working together for eye health and improved visual performance, and reducing the progression of certain eye conditions as we age.

Our Bilberry Fruit extract packs a potent compound of plant pigments called anthocyanins shown to promote healthy tear secretion, improve vision, increase retinal sensitivity (night vision), and help prevent common eye issues as we mature. We extract Bilberry from a fruit called ‘Vaccinium Myrtillus,’ grown in northern central Europe. Bluerex contains the only bilberry extract with properties demonstrated in more than 50 positive clinical & pharmacological studies, including at least 25 controlled or double-blind studies to have no side effects and showed an improvement in vascular health and support of healthy tears secretion. In addition, our standardized extract contains 36% anthocyanins validated by computerized perimetry to play an essential role in improving retinal sensitivity.

A select type of natural and pure Vitamin E, shown to help neutralize oxidative damage that leads to age-related vision problems. It has been shown to help subjects with moderate age-related macular degeneration. In addition, d-alpha-tocopherol reduced the risk of developing advanced age-related macular degeneration by 25% for subjects who already demonstrated early signs of macular degeneration. Vitamin E Natural Tocopherol is naturally found in foods and has proven antioxidant effects. Its primary role within the body is to neutralize oxidation and protect parts of the eye that are susceptible to oxidative damage. The body uses our pure and natural form of Vitamin E more efficiently and has higher bioavailability than its more common synthetic version.

Docosahexaenoic acid, or DHA, is a polyunsaturated omega-3 fatty acid (PUFA) found throughout the body. It's a central structural fat found in the brain and eye, accounting for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain and up to 93% of the omega-3 fats in specific parts of the retina. It is also a vital component of the heart. Numerous research studies confirm that everyone, from infants to adults to the elderly, can benefit from a regular intake of dietary DHA. DHA accounts for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain. Our DHA is a nutritional oil derived from the marine alga, Schizochytrium sp., a rich source of Omega-3 docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) with rosemary extract (flavoring). It is vegetarian and provides essential brain, eye, and heart health benefits. In addition, it contributes to the maintenance of normal vision.

FourStepProcess.title: Younger begins with Clinically Proven Ingredients

items.title: Specific Collagen Peptides
items.body: Create New Collagen at any age

items.expanded: RED ORANGE COMPLEX is a standardized powder extract obtained from the juice of three pigmented (Moro, Tarocco and Sanguinello) varieties of Sicilian blood orange grown exclusively in a particular area surrounding Europes most active volcano, Mt. Etna. Your skin is under constant attack by free radicals, and our Italian-sourced complex, high in phenolic compounds (anthocyanins, flavanones, and hydroxycinnamic acids) is clinically proven to protect against free radicals, enhance collagen production, and lower inflammation, turning dormant collagen-producing cells back on..

items.title: Bovine Source
items.body: Potent, Standardized & Organic
items.expanded: The Bruno MD laboratory process transforms the purest ingredients into a potent standardized powder: an organic, non-GMO, halal, and kosher-certified bovine source, raised exclusively on a plant-based diet, supplied by small European farming partners on the slopes of the Alps. Unlike farmers in the US and Brazil, cattle farmers in the European Union are prohibited from breeding genetically modified bovines or using GMO feed. Our free-range bovine source provides the full bouquet of 18 essential and non-essential amino acids.

Collagen.title: What is Collagen ?
Collagen.description: Collagen is an amazing protein. It’s one of the major building blocks in your body.  In fact, up to 90% of your bones, skin and connective tissues are made of collagen! Plentiful collagen is associated with glowing, wrinkle-free skin, youthful, shiny hair and strong nails and bones. However, after 25, your body produces less & less collagen each day.
Collagen.popupText:
Collagen is seriously important-so how do we replace this vital building block? There are only two ways:


  • Rely on our own bodies to make the collagen we need OR take a daily collagen supplement.
  • Here’s the dilemma. Standard collagen supplements are simply not advanced enough to stimulate the special cells in our bodies that make collagen!

Now, after decades of clinical research, Bruno Pharma, along with its strategic research partners, have discovered a revolutionary process to restart your internal collagen engine.

CollagenPeptides.title: Science solves the collagen dilemma with Royal Collagen Peptides.
CollagenPeptides.subTitle: Not all collagen peptides are equal.
CollagenPeptides.popupText:
Bruno MD Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to help produce new collagen at any age by stimulating your body’s own collagen production! Science calls this endogenous, but we just call it beauty from the inside out.


Unlike standard collagen peptides, Bruno MD® and its research partners have discovered the technology to precisely cut collagen peptides that specifically target cartilage growth, firmer skin, and stronger bones!


The science? Glad you asked.


Bruno MD’s technology is called Specific and controlled enzymatic hydrolysis.


After extraction, collagen consists of very long amino acid chains. These chains are then cut down (hydrolyzed) with the help of enzymes. Enzymes are like natural scissors that trim long chains of amino acids into smaller fragments that your body can easily use.


Once cut, these peptides then need to be optimized. Our patented process fine tunes the chain length, molecular weight and precise sequence of amino acids needed to stimulate exact cells in our bodies that are responsible for connective tissue metabolism.


Next, we supercharge our formula with Red Orange Complex, a potent organic form of vitamin C extracted from a unique variety of blood oranges grown only along the slopes of Mount Etna Volcano in Italy! Our Red Orange Complex maximizes collagen formation and boosts your immunity by providing your body with over 400% of the daily recommended value of Vitamin C. In addition, Red Orange Complex contains precious phenolic compounds which help prevent collagen degradation induced by environmental factors.

items1.expanded: Three clinical trials* conducted on 250 healthy females, ages 45 to 65, confirm that oral intake of Royal Collagen Specific Peptides Complex significantly reduced eye wrinkle volume by 20.1% on average and up to a maximum of 49.9% vs. the placebo group after only eight weeks of treatment.

A recent 24-week clinical trial demonstrated a pronounced improvement in brittle nails, a significant increase in nail growth rate, and decreased the frequency of cracked or chipped nails after daily oral supplementation with Royal Collagen Complex. Participants were aged from 18 to 50 and displayed at least one of the following signs of brittle nails: lamellar splitting of the free edge (lamellar peeling), edge irregularities (fissuring of the distal nail plate), and nail roughness (longitudinal ridging/grooves).

The latest Peer Reviewed, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical trial conducted on 131 postmenopausal women demonstrated that the oral intake of SCP in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly increased bone mineral density (BMD) in both the lumbar spine and the femoral neck vs the placebo group. Another double blind study carried out with approximately 100 women over a period of 3 years, concluded that bone fractures can be reduced by 75% when Royal Collagen Peptides are taken daily.

Royal Collagen Peptides reduce symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improve joint health. In the latest peer-reviewed, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical study conducted in the US, 147 athletes were recruited (75 female, 72 male). After 24 weeks, the study demonstrated that oral intake of SCP contained in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly reduced the symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improved joint health with reduced need for physiotherapy or ice packs. Another US study demonstrated that subjects with relatively mild knee Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disorders) showed changes in tibial cartilage proteoglycan concentration within a 6 month observation period.

items.desc: Clinically Proven to help improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides® help beautify your skin in two ways!
First, our specific peptides biologically stimulate Fibroblast cells. Fibroblasts are special because they build the connective fibers that provide your skin with structure, elasticity, and firmness. The beauty benefits are astonishing: improved skin texture, youthful glow, and fewer fine lines.
Second, Royal Collagen Peptides activate the production of hyaluronic acid, which is essential for firm, younger looking skin.

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote healthy hair.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides® promotes healthy hair.
You’ll read a lot of nonsense out there about how collagen improves hair. Here’s the truth: collagen can’t repair existing hair, but it can significantly improve new hair. Here’s how: the blood vessels that supply nutrients to your roots are made of collagen. In other words, improved microcirculation from our specific collagen peptides helps increase hair vitality and strength by growing healthier hair from the roots up! Hair grows faster and more robust with renewed luster and bounce.

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote faster growth and health fingernails with less chipping.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides promote growth and health of fingernails with less chipping.
Brittle nail syndrome: rough nails that peel, break and crack, affects 20% of the population and more women than men. What’s the fix? Hair and collagen are made from the same protein building blocks. We already learned that collagen can’t improve existing hair and the same rules apply to existing nail growth (no matter what other collagen companies say).
What Royal Collagen Peptides will do is significantly improve new nail growth.
We do this in two ways: First, Royal Collagen improves microcirculation to the nail bed. Next, this flood of nutrients stimulates (upregulates) the genes responsible for the assembly line of proteins that create strong, healthy nails. That’s foundational beauty!

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote bone health.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides keeps your bones strong.
Our Specific Collagen Peptides Complex significantly strengthens bones by increasing bone mineral density. In fact, Royal Collagen Peptides are proven to reduce bone fractures by 75% when taken daily. That’s a staggering improvement.
This is excellent news when it comes to Osteoporosis. Osteoporosis, which means porous bones, is a condition that causes bones to gradually thin and weaken when your body loses more bone than it produces, leaving bones susceptible to fractures.
Bruno Pharma is the Italian Market Leader in advanced formulations for the treatment of Osteoporosis and other metabolic bone diseases.

items.desc: Clinically promote joint health through a natural physiological pathway.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides helps support joint and cartilage function.
Cartilage is an important component of our joints. It acts like a shock absorber wherever two bones meet.When cartilage wears out, bones can rub painfully together. Royal Collagen Peptides reduce symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improve joint health.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of youthful skin
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to stimulate new collagen and beautify skin and tone
ScienceVideos.popupText: Three Peer Reviewed, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical trials conducted on 250 healthy females ranging in age from 45 to 65 years, have shown that oral intake of Royal Collagen Specific Peptides Complex, significantly reduced eye wrinkle volume by 20.1% on average and up to a maximum of 49.9% vs the placebo group after only 8 weeks of treatment.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of stronger nails
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to improve nail growth and promote the health of resilient fingernails
ScienceVideos.popupText: A recent 24-week clinical trial demonstrated a pronounced improvement in brittle nails, a significant increase in nail growth rate, and a decrease in the frequency of cracked or chipped nails after daily oral supplementation with Royal Collagen Complex. Participants were aged from 18 to 50 and displayed at least one of the following signs of brittle nails: lamellar splitting of the free edge (lamellar peeling), edge irregularities (fissuring of the distal nail plate), and nail roughness (longitudinal ridging/grooves).

ScienceVideos.title: The science of stable and flexible bones
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote bone stability, flexibility, health, and biosynthesis of bone extracellular matrix
ScienceVideos.popupText:
About 70% of our bones are made of inorganic minerals, 10% of water, and 20% of Collagen. Collagen forms the framework to which calcium attaches. You can think of collagen as the steel core in a column made of concrete. If collagen is missing, degradation of the bone becomes inevitable.

The latest Peer Reviewed, Randomized,Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Clinical trial conducted on 131 postmenopausal women demonstrated that the oral intake of SCP in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly increased bone mineral density (BMD) in both the lumbar spine and the femoral neck vs the placebo group. Another double-blind study carried out with approximately 100 women over a period of 3 years, concluded that bone fractures can be reduced by 75% when Royal Collagen Peptides are taken daily.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy joints, cartilages, and ligaments
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote joint health, and the growth of cartilage tissue
ScienceVideos.popupText:
Cartilage is not connected to the bloodstream so the only way it receives nutrients is via a “joint lubricant” called synovial fluid. Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to stimulate the activity of the only cells found in cartilage connective tissue called chondrocytes which are responsible for both collagen and hyaluronic acid production in cartilage tissue.

In the latest peer reviewed, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, clinical study conducted in the US, 147 athletes were recruited (75 female, 72 male). After 24 weeks, the study demonstrated that oral intake of SCP contained in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly reduced the symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improved joint health with reduced need for physiotherapy or ice packs. Another US study demonstrated that subjects with relatively mild knee Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disorders) showed changes in tibial cartilage proteoglycan concentration within a 6 month observation period.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy hair
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to strengthen new hair and improve microcirculation
ScienceVideos.popupText:
Bruno MD® Royal Collagen Peptides® are optimized to perfectly resemble the sequence of amino acids that your body recognizes as degradation products thus stimulating the body’s own collagen synthesis.

Long story short? Our technology tells your collagen cells, “Hey! We’re gettin’ low here!” which in turn stimulates these cells to pump out new collagen no matter your levels. So, whether you’re 25 or your 65, your cells are always producing collagen.

items.desc: Clinically Proven to help improve skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides® help beautify your skin in two ways!
First, our specific peptides biologically stimulate Fibroblast cells. Fibroblasts are special because they build the connective fibers that provide your skin with structure, elasticity, and firmness. The beauty benefits are astonishing: improved skin texture, youthful glow, and fewer fine lines.
Second, Royal Collagen Peptides activate the production of hyaluronic acid, which is essential for firm, younger looking skin.

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote healthy hair.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides® promotes healthy hair.
You’ll read a lot of nonsense out there about how collagen improves hair. Here’s the truth: collagen can’t repair existing hair, but it can significantly improve new hair. Here’s how: the blood vessels that supply nutrients to your roots are made of collagen. In other words, improved microcirculation from our specific collagen peptides helps increase hair vitality and strength by growing healthier hair from the roots up! Hair grows faster and more robust with renewed luster and bounce.

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote faster growth and health fingernails with less chipping.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides promote growth and health of fingernails with less chipping.
Brittle nail syndrome: rough nails that peel, break and crack, affects 20% of the population and more women than men. What’s the fix? Hair and collagen are made from the same protein building blocks. We already learned that collagen can’t improve existing hair and the same rules apply to existing nail growth (no matter what other collagen companies say).
What Royal Collagen Peptides will do is significantly improve new nail growth.
We do this in two ways: First, Royal Collagen improves microcirculation to the nail bed. Next, this flood of nutrients stimulates (upregulates) the genes responsible for the assembly line of proteins that create strong, healthy nails. That’s foundational beauty!

items.desc: Clinically proven to promote bone health.
items.expanded:
Royal Collagen Peptides keeps your bones strong.
Our Specific Collagen Peptides Complex significantly strengthens bones by increasing bone mineral density. In fact, Royal Collagen Peptides are proven to reduce bone fractures by 75% when taken daily. That’s a staggering improvement.
This is excellent news when it comes to Osteoporosis. Osteoporosis, which means porous bones, is a condition that causes bones to gradually thin and weaken when your body loses more bone than it produces, leaving bones susceptible to fractures.
Bruno Pharma is the Italian Market Leader in advanced formulations for the treatment of Osteoporosis and other metabolic bone diseases.

items.desc: Clinically promote joint health through a natural physiological pathway.
items.expanded:

ScienceVideos.title: The science of stable and flexible bones
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote bone stability, flexibility, health, and biosynthesis of bone extracellular matrix
ScienceVideos.popupText:
About 70% of our bones are made of inorganic minerals, 10% of water, and 20% of Collagen. Collagen forms the framework to which calcium attaches. You can think of collagen as the steel core in a column made of concrete. If collagen is missing, degradation of the bone becomes inevitable.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy joints, cartilages, and ligaments
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote joint health, and the growth of cartilage tissue
ScienceVideos.popupText:
Cartilage is not connected to the bloodstream so the only way it receives nutrients is via a “joint lubricant” called synovial fluid. Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to stimulate the activity of the only cells found in cartilage connective tissue called chondrocytes which are responsible for both collagen and hyaluronic acid production in cartilage tissue.

In the latest peer reviewed, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, clinical study conducted in the US, 147 athletes were recruited (75 female, 72 male). After 24 weeks, the study demonstrated that oral intake of SCP contained in our Royal Collagen Peptides Complex significantly reduced the symptoms of joint pain associated with strenuous athletic activity and improved joint health with reduced need for physiotherapy or ice packs. Another US study demonstrated that subjects with relatively mild knee Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disorders) showed changes in tibial cartilage proteoglycan concentration within a 6 month observation period.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy hair

ScienceVideos.popupText:
Bruno MD® Royal Collagen Peptides® are optimized to perfectly resemble the sequence of amino acids that your body recognizes as degradation products thus stimulating the body’s own collagen synthesis.

Long story short? Our technology tells your collagen cells, “Hey! We’re gettin’ low here!” which in turn stimulates these cells to pump out new collagen no matter your levels. So, whether you’re 25 or your 65, your cells are always producing collagen.

Unlike farmers in the US and Brazil, cattle farmers in the European Union are prohibited from breeding genetically modified bovines or using GMO feed. Our free-range bovine source provides the full bouquet of 18 essential and non-essential amino acids.

Collagen.title: What is Collagen ?
Collagen.description: Collagen is an amazing protein. It’s one of the major building blocks in your body.  In fact, up to 90% of your bones, skin and connective tissues are made of collagen! Plentiful collagen is associated with glowing, wrinkle-free skin, youthful, shiny hair and strong nails and bones. However, after 25, your body produces less & less collagen each day.
Collagen.popupText:
Collagen is seriously important-so how do we replace this vital building block? There are only two ways:


  • Rely on our own bodies to make the collagen we need OR take a daily collagen supplement.
  • Here’s the dilemma. Standard collagen supplements are simply not advanced enough to stimulate the special cells in our bodies that make collagen!

Now, after decades of clinical research, Bruno Pharma, along with its strategic research partners, have discovered a revolutionary process to restart your internal collagen engine.

CollagenPeptides.title: Science solves the collagen dilemma with Royal Collagen Peptides.
CollagenPeptides.subTitle: Not all collagen peptides are equal.
CollagenPeptides.popupText:
Bruno MD Royal Collagen Peptides are clinically proven to help produce new collagen at any age by stimulating your body’s own collagen production! Science calls this endogenous, but we just call it beauty from the inside out.


Unlike standard collagen peptides, Bruno MD® and its research partners have discovered the technology to precisely cut collagen peptides that specifically target cartilage growth, firmer skin, and stronger bones!


The science? Glad you asked.


Bruno MD’s technology is called Specific and controlled enzymatic hydrolysis.


After extraction, collagen consists of very long amino acid chains. These chains are then cut down (hydrolyzed) with the help of enzymes. Enzymes are like natural scissors that trim long chains of amino acids into smaller fragments that your body can easily use.


Once cut, these peptides then need to be optimized. Our patented process fine tunes the chain length, molecular weight and precise sequence of amino acids needed to stimulate exact cells in our bodies that are responsible for connective tissue metabolism.


Next, we supercharge our formula with Red Orange Complex, a potent organic form of vitamin C extracted from a unique variety of blood oranges grown only along the slopes of Mount Etna Volcano in Italy! Our Red Orange Complex maximizes collagen formation and boosts your immunity by providing your body with over 400% of the daily recommended value of Vitamin C. In addition, Red Orange Complex contains precious phenolic compounds which help prevent collagen degradation induced by environmental factors.

FourStepProcess.title: Cool inflammation with Clinically Proven Ingredients

items.title: Don’t Boost. Balance
items.body: “Boosting” your immune system has unintended consequences
items.expanded: Our immune system is designed to seek and destroy pathogens, but boosting your system to respond to pathogens outside of a healthy range can throw your body into overdrive, causing a cytokine storm and potentially causing long-term or even life-threatening damage.  Instead of boosting, Riboflam’s clinically-proven ingredients focus on balance. A balanced immune response does not over or underreact to invaders-instead, it activates a measured, proportional response.

items.title: Ultra-Bioavailability
items.body: New technology rewrites the rules of bioavailability
items.expanded: Our bodies have evolved to view beneficial plant-based polyphenols as useless or dangerous. For this reason, nutrients that help manage inflammation, like curcumin, are blocked by your gut before they can enter your bloodstream. No matter how much curcumin you take, the benefits are minimal without new Phytosome Technology used by Bruno MD.  Phytosome uses biomimicry to wrap polyphenols in a fatty lipid, like a delivery truck. With the curcumin molecule hidden inside, the lipid passes through the gut and into your bloodstream with 3000% more bioavailability. As a result, Phytosome sets the new standard in prescription-grade natural ingredients.

items.title: Coactive Health
items.body: A breakthrough formulation of ingredients: all-natural, and clinically proven
items.expanded: Bruno MD formulates Riboflam with three coactive elements that work powerfully together.   Phytosome Complex helps regulate inflammation and balance the immune system with four unique Phytosome deliverables: Curcumin, Echinacea, Boswellia and Quercetin Phyotosome.  Nucleotides Yeast Extracts help white blood cells called lymphocytes  respond to pathogens.  Astaxanthin is a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant; active in at least five different inflammation pathways to help maintain a balanced immune system and provide protection to cells from damaging free-radicals.

items.title: Clinically Proven Ingredients
items.body: Bruno MD uses Ingredients tested and endorsed by top research and medical institutions
items.expanded: All ingredients in Bruno MD products are clinically-proven and backed by hundreds of studies. One example is Curcumin; the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.

Collagen.title: What is Inflammation?
Collagen.description: Inflammation is your body’s immune system’s reaction to stress. There are two kinds of immune reactions: acute and chronic.
Collagen.popupText:
The first kind is beneficial, but chronic inflammation is a serious health risk and a leading cause of human disease. Luckily, it’s never too late to start managing chronic inflammation.

An acute inflammation response occurs after an injury, like a sprained ankle or sore muscles after a hard workout. Once the threat of infection or injury passes, the inflammation subsides.

Chronic inflammation is a low-level response that attacks the whole body over time and does not subside, which leads to diabetes, cancer, cardiovascular disease, and Alzheimer’s. Chronic inflammation can also cause your immune system to overreact, leading to severe, even deadly consequences.

CollagenPeptides.title: How can we manage chronic inflammation?
CollagenPeptides.subTitle: There isn’t a single food or habit you can adopt to balance your immune system overnight, but trying these seven healthy living strategies is an excellent place to start.
CollagenPeptides.popupText:
• Good nutrition. Eat smaller portions, primarily plants.
  • More Phytochemicals. Eat more fruits and vegetables. They contain phytochemicals that support the immune system and create healthy cells.
  • Dietary supplements. Take dietary supplements from GMP-certified companies if you can’t get enough nutrients through your diet.
  • Lifestyle. Try the Mediterranean lifestyle: maintain a healthy weight, limit alcohol, stop smoking, stay hydrated, and socialize more.
  • Sleep. Proper sleep initiates processes that reduce inflammation.
  • Minimize stress. Physical and mental stress both cause inflammation.
  • Exercise regularly. An active lifestyle helps your immune system. Simply put, move more.
Post-workout pain? Try Riboflam®, which has been clinically proven to reduce post-exercise pain.

Curious how your immune system works? It has two main teams: innate and acquired (or adaptive). The innate team acts quickly on germs or viruses to protect us immediately. The adaptive team, with T-cells and B-cells (lymphocytes), “remembers” past attacks to identify future threats. B-cells create antibodies that specifically target germs for destruction. T-cells come in two types: helper T-cells, which boost the production of antibodies and support other immune cells, and killer T-cells, which take out cells that germs have already invaded.

items1.expanded: Curcumin is a member of the diarylheptanoid class of natural products (curcuminoids) derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant, commonly called turmeric. Curcumin is the most studied compound in the world. Bruno MD’s curcumin phytosome is independently endorsed by the prestigious Cleveland Clinic as the #1 doctor recommended curcumin formulation in the turmeric market and the formulation of choice for their leading practitioners and their patients.  Turmeric and has been used for thousands of years in Southeast Asia, China, and India for cooking and medicinal uses. Curcumin Phytosome is clinically proven in 35 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, published clinical trials to promote a healthy inflammatory response, boost immune response, and provide relief from exercise-related pain.   It works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body. The extract has been standardized and contains the full bouquet of curcuminoids, not just curcumin (Curcuminoids are polyphenolic pigments and include 77% curcumin, 17% demethoxycurcumin, and 3% bisdemethoxycurcumin). It is called a “Life Guardian” because it helps control chronic inflammation and boost immune response at any age.  Western scientists have rigorously tested Turmeric and its compounds for decades, including for heart disease. Results show that Turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system: (vii.193)  Prevent or delay the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. (vii.68) Protect the heart from inflammation and atherosclerosis promoted by chronic exposure to air pollution. (vii.194) Regulate or help lower high blood pressure. (vii.193, 195) Restores antioxidant levels and reduces free radical damage from toxic chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193) Improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially combined with exercise. (vii.196) Reduce heart damage caused by chronic kidney disease (by blocking free radical damage and boosting mitochondrial function). (vii.197) Help stop the formation of dangerous blood clots, including those that cause stroke. (vii.198-199) Prevent cardiac hypertrophy due to high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes. An enlarged heart can lead to heart failure and even death. (vii.193) Protects the heart from injury caused by sepsis and chemotherapy drugs. (vii.193, 200)  Turmeric’s rhizome contains potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds. Studies suggest that some of the ways turmeric compounds protect liver cells and can help prevent liver fibrosis are as follows: (vii.13)  Stimulating transcription factor proteins that prompt genes to generate natural antioxidants (such as glutathione). (vii.13) Preventing activation and growth of cells in the liver that produce excess structural components. Hepatic stellate cells (HSCs) and fibroblasts are the cells mainly involved in fibrosis. (vii.13) Suppressing inflammatory transcription factors (such as NF-κB) and cytokine proteins (such as TNF-α) that can activate HSCs directly and/or indirectly. For example, TNF-α directly blocks signals from insulin, the hormone needed to metabolize blood sugar. Impaired sugar metabolism can activate HSCs. (vii.13, 31, 279) Promoting other transcription factor proteins, such as PPAR-γ, that block the activation and proliferation of HSCs. PPAR-γ also suppresses the expression of inflammatory proteins, such as the growth factor TGF-β, that promote collagen production. (vii.13, 198) Decreasing harmful triglyceride and cholesterol deposits in the liver. (vii.279) Reducing type I collagen, the primary substance in fibrotic scar tissue in the liver produced by HSCs and fibroblasts. (vii.284)

Indian Frankincense is a botanical extract harvested from the gum resin of the Boswellia Serrata tree. Boswellia Serrata Phytosome helps govern inflammatory response in the joints, bones, respiratory airways, the bowel, and brain.   In addition, clinical studies have shown that a cocktail of AKBA (Acetyl-11-Keto-𝛃-Boswellic Acid) and curcumin significantly inhibit certain viral infections (viral entry) compared to the untreated control. BRUNO MD uses Boswellia Phytosome extract that is 400% more bioavailable than regular Boswellia.

The use of Echinacea is traced back to Native Americans who used it as a natural anti-inflammatory. Historically other uses include relief of mouth pain and toothache, treatment of the common cold and cough, tonsillitis relief, and treatment of septic diseases.   Bruno MD cultivates our coneflower from an Italian varietal. Our plants guarantee high polysaccharides and low cross-contamination between Echinacea species.   Echinacea Angustifolia Phytosome is optimized for maximum absorption. Results in clinical trials conducted using our triple-standardized Echinacea Phytosome have shown a statistically significant tendency to be more efficacious than flu vaccination alone, suggesting that E. Phytosome has the potential to act synergistically with influenza vaccination.
