ratings.name: YogaKat 🧘‍♀️🙏 💕
ratings.subTitle: Good quality CoQ10 along with other ingredients to help with my cholesterol
ratings.review:
I was on statins briefly but I had some really bad side effects. My cholesterol is not critical, but it keeps going up every year and has gotten into the bad range. I need to go see my doctor in the next couple months, so I am attempting to do some improvements to my higher levels by taking this along with some dietary and lifestyle changes. 
 I have been taking high doses of COQ10 and was looking to replenish my supply when I saw this product. It has very good high quality COQ10, but also other ingredients that might help my cholesterol including Bergamot, Turmeric, and Cardoon (which is artichoke thistle). 
 I take these in the morning - 2 capsules. I like that they are capsules and not hard tablets. They do not give me a tummy ache at all. They recommend taking one in the morning and one at night, but I don’t like taking a lot of supplements in the evening. I pretty much keep my night time intake of supplements to my blood pressure medication and natural herbal sleep aids. This is working well as far as I can tell. 
 Along with starting to take this product I am also eating oatmeal every other morning. I also walk at least 30 minutes a day and sometimes 2 hours. I also have a home spinning bike so I do 30-45 minutes on that. I am also trying to lose a bit of weight by tracking my calories using Tap and Track app. My point is, just taking this alone isn’t going to solve high cholesterol levels. Combining this with other lifestyle changes will...at least hopefully in my case. I am working really hard to make those changes. 
 My only critique of this product is the bergamot, turmeric, and cardoon are not organic. There is a risk if pesticides were used during the growth in process that those pesticides could be concentrated in the extract. I am marking down by 1-star because of that. 
 You also get a little freebie gift with this product and I love it! Is a little hot/cold pack. I love heating it up in the microwave, then putting it between my shoulder blades on my back while I lay on my back. It is so relaxing and helps with stress and tension so much. I never thought something so small could make such a difference. It was a nice surprise to get that with this product.

ratings.name: Jameson
ratings.subTitle: Reasonably priced for quality bergamot and coQ10.
ratings.review:
I was looking for a bergamot supplement and learned that it can be very pricey depending on quality, etc. 
 I considered this formula bc it provided reasonably priced bergamot plus coQ10 which I was already taking. 
 I have high cholesterol due to genetics so I figured I would give this a try bc I never want to go on statins. Thankfully I'm the MD says I'm too young to start worrying about even needing statins but in my book, prevention is better than correction. Plus, I like to try/rotate diff antioxidants. Bergamot is high in flavonoids which are supposedto help w/ immune sys & inflammation.
 According to the prior reading I'd done, there isnt enough evidence to conclude that it definitely makes a diff in inflammation but there is a number of studies w/ evidence to prove that it's been effective for the treatment of high cholesterol. 
 I don't know if its helped any without getting a blood test and I wont be doing that for another 6 months at least. 
 So what I can say is that the manufacturer has really done their best to check all the boxes to provide a robust profile of complimentary supplements. The amber glass bottle is beneficial as well bc both bergamot and coQ10 should not be stored in direct light. The literature enclosed was very detailed and the bottle was securely packaged in a padded box (shown in pix). 
 Expiration date on my bottle is June 2022.
 I think its worth giving this brand and this specific formula a try. It does cost less than bergamot only supplements so if you ever wanted to try bergamot but were put off by the price, this would be a great way to ease into it & see how you feel. 
 I hope my humble opinion helps you in some way. 
 Thank you for reading.

ratings.name: William Michael
ratings.subTitle: Good but pricy
ratings.review:
This product has a lot going for it. A close look at the ingredients and even a peruse of their site gives an idea of the quality. My only caveat is $2-per-day cost of using this supplement as directed. Nevertheless, Coenzyme Q (ubiquinone) has important health benefits, much more so than most supplements. This product uses a variation called CholestQ10, and I'm not clear on how it compares with standard CoQ10. It's also a little confusing as to how much the maker recommends daily. The bottle contains 60 capsules and states "30 servings," but the site recommends 3 capsules per day, which means 20-day supply. 
 In any case, the generally recommended maximum daily dose of CoQ10 is 1,200 mg/day, and that's for someone with fairly high bad cholesterol levels, though it might be different for CholestQ10. Consequently, since my cholesterol level is only slightly on the high side, I'm taking one capsule per day in addition to red rice yeast capsules. However, too much CoQ10 is not necessarily dangerous; the most common side effects are minor GI distress. In addition to CholestQ10, the other ingredients seem to provide support for digestion and metabolic processes (but this is based solely on my non-expert research). Tea drinkers will recognize another ingredient (bergamot) as the herbal flavor in Earl Gray.
 In general, the company seems to be a good one that strives to provide quality supplements. However, the price is a little above my monthly budget. Nonetheless, if it proves effective, I'd rather pay for this than for prescription pharmaceuticals. For those with high cholesterol and a more generous budget, I'd recommend giving this a try for at least a few months.

ratings.name: J&J
ratings.subTitle: Nice packaging
ratings.review:
It's kinda hard to tell if something like this is working without a blood test.So since he just had a test done to monitor his cholesterol, we'll see at next follow up.His cholesterol was borderline a year ago. Now it deems a statin to regulate.
  If an OTC natural supplement could do the job, would much prefer that route. 
 Turns out 60% of high cholesterol is genetic.
 So even if you're a healthy eater & exercise like he does, worth checking out. 
  As to BrunoMD & their luxury price point. 
 He took it with no after taste or heartburn kick back. 
 The label appears forthright with decent ingredients including turmeric & bergamont. 
 This may sound corny but we both loved the "stress pillow" gift. 
 It's a hand-sized bean bag with a removable velvet cover to clean.
 Designed to help destress with so many uses. 
  Smells like lavender & something else I can't put my finger on. 
 Not pefumey, just calming. 
 Warmed in microwave & rested on my forehead for The Worst headache. It helped. It's a nice touch.

ratings.name: Johnny
ratings.subTitle: Can CoQ10 aid heart health?
ratings.review:
The jury is out. This Bruno MD supplement gives the exotic name of CholestQ10 to CoQ10, which is readily available for far less than $2 a dose. However, when a coupon is offered, this NatureWise version becomes a better value. This nutrient is produced by the body and further supplementation is believed by many to be beneficial for heart health and cholesterol levels. Clinical studies to date are mixed, yet do indicate promise, advising that additional detailed trials are warranted. 
 One highly effective ingredient in CholestQ10 Is Curcumin, derived from turmeric and highly regarded for its antioxidant properties. The packaging is beautiful and the box contains a small surprise gift. A consultation with your doctor is warranted before embarking on taking any supplement.

ratings.name: AE Gross
ratings.subTitle: These have some good ingredients to aid in cholesterol and heart health
ratings.review:
I've got borderline high levels of cholesterol, which isn't too difficult to control. However, the ingredients in this supplement are ones I've taken in the past but never in one pill. It was quite interesting to start this regimen. It is easy enough to take, which I usually split the dose between morning and evening. 
 They are a bit on the larger side, so if you take a few supplements at once, this one may be a challenge to completely get down without some extra sips of water. 
 As for any odd tastes, I haven't noticed any. There haven't been any stomach upset or discomfort either. I normally get stomach issues when any supplement or food doesn't sit well with me. Whether these are helping with the cholesterol levels remain to be seen. The cost of these are a bit exorbitant though.

ratings.name: Mad Max
ratings.subTitle: Very thoughtful blend of quality ingredients, just a bit expensive
ratings.review:
My only complaint is that its a tad expensive. And I do wish it told you exactly how much CoQ10 you're getting, my doctor wants me on 400mg daily, and I have no idea how much I'm getting with this. 
 Otherwise, this is a great blend of thoughtful ingredients. In addition to the CoQ10, you get Vitamin E and a blend of other phospholipids and extracts that have a variety of potential benefits. They're also prepared in a way to provide optimal absorption. 
 The veg cap is normal size, easy to swallow, daily recommended dose is 2 veg caps. I didn't notice any flavor or have any burps. I'm very impressed all around, just wish they were more affordable.

ratings.name: Chris F.
ratings.subTitle: Decent COQ10
ratings.review: I have not really noticed any difference between these pills and other CO Q10 in their effectiveness. Ido like that this should also assist in reducing cholesterol as I recently started taking a statin as well, and while it doesn't hurt me enough to stop taking it, the medication did give me a few muscle spasms and random aches and pains, just enough to keep me awake. So my doctor recommended COQ 10. It really has helped me a lot! I would say by at least 90%. I can now sleep once again without having to take a bunch of pain-killers that only kinda-sorta work on the problem. My only complaint is that for 60 caps the current price ($60) is rather high.

ratings.name: Greystoke
ratings.subTitle: Good Product, Very Pricey
ratings.review:
This product is produced by Bruno MD, which I have found to be very transparent about the ingredients for their products. I like that a lot! 
 The product has al;l the right stuff in it, and should help in reducing the wife's cholesterol number to a better range, but the price is abhorrent at $60 a month. 
 Presuming the product works as well as it is supposed to, we may stick with it, but the price is still high. I hope this was helpful.

ratings.name: JDE
ratings.subTitle: special product, but very expensive
ratings.review: These pills are a nice product, featuring a special type of CoQ10 and some other vegan ingredients such as turmeric and orange. It comes is a very handsome package, with foam to secure the bottle. It also came with a bonus aromatherapy bag. It is a fine product, but it is very expensive. One good thing is you can halve the dose (take one a day instead of two) and make it last twice as long, but it is still $1 per pill, which is a lot.

ratings.name: Jerry P. Danzig
ratings.subTitle: May Help But Pricey
ratings.review:
My heart doctor had been thinking about adding another anti-cholesterol drug to my regimen, but for a month or two before my latest checkup I took this stuff along with my atorvastatin. 
 This seems to have helped; she didn't add a new medication. 
 Unfortunately, at $60 for a month's supply, this stuff busts my budget. Medicare would probably cover the cost of the AMA prescription product she was talking about.
 So I think I'll give a pass on this myself, but if your budget allows, it's worth a try...

ratings.name: majormusiclover
ratings.subTitle: Excellent Quality
ratings.review:
Serving - 2 = Bottle 30 servings. One in the am / pm w/food The capsules are fairly large - 7/8" long, but doable. 
 My interest in this complex is the Q10 for supporting good circulation / heart health. 
 And as with any nutrition that also helps fight against cancer, that factor gives a bit of peace of mind. 
 The Bruno MD proprietary blend doesn't let one know what the mg are for each ingredient which is problematic for those that want to know their intake. 
 Only states Bergamont orange extract - Turmeric extract - Coenzyme Q10 = 1,400 mg. Bur all the Bruno products I've tried have been very high quality,and this appears the same high level. 
 Not to be dismissed = Cardoon -100mg (AKA artichoke thistle) also present - has high levels of Folic acid and is historically used for lowing cholesterol. 
 Impressive presentation - comes in a strong cardboard box with a booklet about this product. And a complimentary (reusable) aromatherapy pack that can be heated in the microwave or cooled in the freezer for hot / cold compress. 
 Completely vegan - a very high quality product in content and in the vegan capsule. 5 stars

ratings.name: Pete Chen
ratings.subTitle: Unique ingredients by "Bruno MD" brand
ratings.review:
This product has a combination of unique ingredients. First of all, CoQ10 and Curcumin are not something new. They are known for regulating Cholesterol level and heart health. I am surprised it doesn't come with Bioprene to enhance the absorption of Curcumin just like other Curcumin supplements do. Bergamot orange extract is another known ingredient to reduce inflammation, lower cholesterol levels, and increase positive mood. Cardoon Leaf Extract is something new to me. Here it claims to inhibit fat accumulation in the hepatocytes (liver cells).
 Overall, this is a unique recipe from Bruno MD store. I really would to know the exact portions of CoQ10 and Curcumin. You can give it a try. I have not had it long enough to tell anything special. The instruction says one capsule in the morning and another in the evening. 
 The packaging is quite excessive. It comes in a foam padded cardboard box. It also has an aromatherapy pouch in the box. It smells lavender.

ratings.name: OhioAwesome
ratings.subTitle: Expensive CO-Q10 supplement...
ratings.review:
While there are CO-Q10 supplement studies that imply it supports improved blood pressure, cholesterol, and other anti-oxidant properties, the added few ingredients which are mostly available as separate supplements may not be worth the cost of this product. One could buy about 8x as many 200mg capsules of another brand at about the same price.
  While it is beautifully packaged and includes a "free" gift, I have a concerns as it is provided without any dosage information even. Even the Amazon brands provide these and add in testing and efficacy guarantees on some. If you have money to burn, feel free... but for those of us that budget, there are better options... so I am giving it a basic three stars.

ratings.name: RockyRoad
ratings.subTitle: Synergistic formula
ratings.review:
On paper, this synergistic formulation is going to be extremely helpful not just in cardiac care, but also longevity. 
 Since I can hardly review how long I'm going to live, I can tell you that I feel comfortable with this high quality supplement and the research that's gone into it. 
 I like that someone else has gone and done the digging to find out what component makes another even more powerful and effective, and offers them as a single supplement.

ratings.name: AD
ratings.subTitle: Best product ever! It's worth the money!
ratings.review: I have tried different product from this brand and I am a big fan of their high quality and effective products. This CholestQ10 came in a really nice packaging containing 60 capsules which is enough for 30 serving as you need to take 2 capsules per day. So although it looks pricey for one month product but I can assure you that it's worth the money. It's perfect for improving your cholesterol levels and you can see its affect on improving cardiac action after using it constantly. It's a great, high quality and effective product and I highly recommend it.

ratings.name: Nacho Lovin' Crazy Cat Lady
ratings.subTitle: Wonderful ingredients
ratings.review: I've been taking this for about a week. Too soon to tell if it does me any good, but for the meantime, it causes no tummy issues. I have a hard time taking any supplements due to most making me feel like I have to vomit whether I take with a meal or not. This doesn't make me feel that way so that's saying a lot. You can tell from the packaging, etc., that this company is "real" and one you can put your trust in.

ratings.name: J. Hiatt
ratings.subTitle: Helps replace good cholesterol
ratings.review: These capsules arrived intact and undamaged. They are on the larger side, but I did not have any issues with swallowing them. There is a slight scent to the capsules, but unless you sniff hard it is not really that bad. I took this supplement and did not have any bad after effects from taking them. Coq10 is helpful with making the good cholesterol, if you take statins you should also be taking coq10 to replace the good cholesterol. This is important because good cholesterol preserves the brain. This product also contains turmeric, which in studies has shown to be anti-inflammatory. These supplements are also vegan which makes me happy. With today's fast food lifestyle, I feel it is worth it to take care of your cholesterol health.

ratings.name: Wylee's mom
ratings.subTitle: Supplements I can trust.......
ratings.review: I got this product for my husband who is on cholesterol medication and struggles to keep his numbers in the green. I saw that this product contains CoQ10 and it may help with his cholesterol and I knew I had to try it. I have used many Bruno MD supplements and I'm extremely impressed with this line of health products, they go the extra mile to provide a superior product. So my husband it now taking two capsules every day of CholestCoQ10 supplement and I feel good knowing he is in good hands with Bruno MD. And as usual there is a small gift in box :-)

ratings.name: Christine
ratings.subTitle: Health is wealth!!!
ratings.review:
So I just had all my bloodwork done for my yearly wellness visit and my cholesterol was just a little high but not at all concerning to be on a medication. I am a healthy weight and watch what I eat and exercise at least 6 days a week so my doctor suggested I take a supplement to help. She suggested a Vegan plant-based supplement so I got these and sent her a text with a picture (my docs office has an app and you can send your provider messages) she said these looked great! So I started these without any tummy issues and will have to report back later but for now I am excited to find such a great product! 
 They have a full line of other products so I am so happy to come across this gem for my health! ❤️

ratings.name: Family7
ratings.subTitle: Hopeful it will make positive changes.
ratings.review: This actually has a lightly unpleasant scent to it, but I swallow it quickly and easily. It is a fair sized capsule. Love the look of the bottle. I have tested slightly on the abnormal range of my cholesterol and decided to take something natural, such as this, to help assist in its stabilization. I did not experience any negative effects, and I am hopeful this will do me good. I feel generally very good.

ratings.name: Delaney
ratings.subTitle: 2 a day
ratings.review: Take two a day one in the morning and one in the evening. These capsules are large but they are not too bad to swallow. They have a little Bergamot aftertaste. The bottle is quite fancy with glitter and multicolor gold labeling. I know CoQ10 can be a bit pricey and this seemed like a 'luxury' supplement, I am not sure if I would continue to pay $30 a month for this supplement. I cannot speak to whether it is more effective than any other brand.

ratings.name: Auntie Annie
ratings.subTitle: Best possible choice
ratings.review: I have high cholesterol and am unable to take statins. They give me joint pain and muscle cramps, which is a frequent side effect of statins. I also have a terrible family history of heart disease. I read all the literature on viable alternatives to statins and decided on these capsules. They have a variety of ingredients known to lower bad cholesterol and raise the good cholesterol. I have not as yet had my lipid panel done since I have been on this, but I feel I made the best possible choice of alternatives.

ratings.name: Sean McGill
ratings.subTitle: every heart doctor I know talk about the benefits of Q10
ratings.review: This product has what i want for my heart health. I run regularly and this supplement is a must. Taking care of our most important muscle is imperative. Easy to swallow too.

ratings.name: Geoff
ratings.subTitle: A Solid Coenzyme Q10 Suppliment
ratings.review: It doesn't really matter, but the Bruno MD CholestQ10 is one of the better packaged supplements that I've seen It comes with a manual and a fancy jar. Presentation was not missed by the folks at Bruno MD. Beyond the looks, the supplement is a solid one, and includes some supporting herbs beyond the CoCQ10 to support cardiovascular health. I haven't had any negative reactions to this supplement and I consider myself VERY sensitive.

ratings.name: NJD & DMD
ratings.subTitle: A great daily supplement
ratings.review: My husband has had issues with his cholesterol so we ordered him these. He's been taking them daily and they've actually helped his numbers. We recommend them without hesitation to anyone considering them. Five stars.

ratings.name: AJ
ratings.subTitle: A pricey option with a lot of claims
ratings.review: I've been taking CoQ10 for a while now but this is my first time trying this particular brand. It's definitely pricier than some of the other ones I've tried, working out to $2 a day. I know there are a lot of claims to justify that price but it's hard to know if it's really that much better than the more affordable options. The other thing is that these are fairly large pills. If you have any issues swelling pills I would suggest trying a different option.

ratings.name: LA
ratings.subTitle: Interesting Way to Combat High Cholesterol But Too Expensive
ratings.review:
UPDATE: I had my cholesterol test this week, and this product did NOT work for me. In fact, my numbers went UP. Very disappointed. I used this product in combination with exercise and diet, and though it may work for others, it was a waste of money for me.
 ORIGINAL REVIEW: This is the first time I've taken something like this. Historically, I've had high cholesterol numbers, so I am curious how this affect my numbers when I next have my physical. 
 I like that these capsules are vegan. I also like that research studies appear to back up the efficacy of this supplement 
  Still, it's simply too expensive for most people. Hopefully, the price can come down soon, so that more people who struggle with high cholesterol numbers can use this supplement.

Astaxanthin is stronger than other antioxidants when combating singlet oxygen damage for eye health. Singlet oxygens are active oxygen species generated in human skin by exposure to ultraviolet radiation (UV) that causes eye damage. Bluerex Astaxanthin is 6000 times stronger than Vitamin C and 3000 times more potent than Resveratrol. Bluerex protects the back of the eye from free radical damage with Lutein and Zeaxanthin, which naturally increase MPOD (Macular Optical Pigment Density) levels inside your eye. This yellow pigmentation acts like internal sunglasses to filter high-energy blue light before it hits your macula.

Collagen.title: What is Cholesterol?
Collagen.description: Cholesterol is a waxy, fat-like substance found in your blood. It's crucial for building healthy cells and making hormones, but too much of it, especially the 'bad' type, can lead to health problems.
Collagen.popupText:
What is “bad” cholesterol?

There are two main types of cholesterol: HDL (High-Density Lipoprotein) and LDL (Low-Density Lipoprotein). Think of HDL as the 'good' cholesterol because it helps remove LDL from the arteries, reducing the risk of heart disease.

On the other hand, LDL is often called the 'bad' cholesterol because when there's too much of it, it can build up in the walls of your arteries, forming plaque. This buildup leads to atherosclerosis, which narrows the arteries and restricts blood flow.

Why We Need to Control It:

Controlling bad cholesterol is essential for maintaining good heart health. When LDL levels are high, it increases the risk of developing heart disease and stroke. Heart disease is one of the leading causes of death globally, so keeping your cholesterol levels in check is crucial for preventing these serious health issues.

CollagenPeptides.title: Why heart disease is rising and five simple habits to improve heart health.
CollagenPeptides.subTitle: Many countries offer programs to help individuals reduce their cholesterol and blood pressure.
CollagenPeptides.popupText:
Unfortunately, awareness alone won’t fix the growing prevalence of the Western diet. Even the best habits can’t overcome the negative impacts of the gradual move away from locally sourced nutrition and the Mediterranean-style diet toward highly processed fast food.

Five Simple Steps to a Healthier Heart-

  1. Healthy Diet: Eating a balanced diet low in saturated and trans fats can help lower LDL cholesterol. Focus on incorporating plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins into your meals.
  2. Regular Exercise: Being physically active can raise HDL cholesterol levels and lower LDL cholesterol. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise most days of the week.
  3. Maintain a Healthy Weight: Being overweight or obese can increase LDL cholesterol levels. Losing even a small amount of weight can help improve your cholesterol profile.
  4. Limit Alcohol and Avoid Smoking: Excessive alcohol consumption can raise triglyceride levels and lead to high cholesterol. Smoking damages your blood vessels and increases the risk of heart disease.
  5. Supplement your diet: Natural ingredients can help manage cholesterol and keep it in the healthy range. The clinically proven, natural ingredients in CholestQ10® are delivered with Phytosome® Technology, which delivers hard-to-absorb ingredients into your bloodstream with up to 3000% more bioavailability.

items.expanded: Natural Astaxanthin, microalgae, accumulates Astaxanthin in lipid vesicles during periods of nutrient deficiency and environmental stress. Because this alga grows in places exposed to intense sunlight during its dormant phase, it has evolved to use Astaxanthin to protect the cell nucleus against free radicals generated by UV radiation. These potent anti-inflammatory properties provide front eye protection by alleviating oxidative stress and help reduce eye fatigue and strain, common symptoms of computer vision syndrome.
items.desc: Clinically proven to support a healthy inflammatory
Clinically proven to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels.
items.expanded: These all-natural compounds are harvested from marigold flowers and dramatically increase the macular pigments critical to filtering harmful blue light before it can damage your retina. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are clinically proven partners to help reduce the progression of specific eye issues throughout our lives. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are two types of ‘carotenoids’ found in food, mainly in vegetables and fruit. They play critical antioxidant functions within our body by guarding the eyes against the damaging effects of free radicals, working together for eye health and improved visual performance, and reducing the progression of certain eye conditions as we age.

items.desc: Promotes healthy aging, heart & cardiovascular health, brain health, and all activities involving energetic expenditure
items.expanded: Our Bilberry Fruit extract packs a potent compound of plant pigments called anthocyanins shown to promote healthy tear secretion, improve vision, increase retinal sensitivity (night vision), and help prevent common eye issues as we mature. We extract Bilberry from a fruit called ‘Vaccinium Myrtillus,’ grown in northern central Europe. Bluerex contains the only bilberry extract with properties demonstrated in more than 50 positive clinical & pharmacological studies, including at least 25 controlled or double-blind studies to have no side effects and showed an improvement in vascular health and support of healthy tears secretion. In addition, our standardized extract contains 36% anthocyanins validated by computerized perimetry to play an essential role in improving retinal sensitivity.

items.desc: Can inhibit fat accumulation in the hepatocytes (liver cells)
items.expanded: A select type of natural and pure Vitamin E, shown to help neutralize oxidative damage that leads to age-related vision problems. It has been shown to help subjects with moderate age-related macular degeneration. In addition, d-alpha-tocopherol reduced the risk of developing advanced age-related macular degeneration by 25% for subjects who already demonstrated early signs of macular degeneration. Vitamin E Natural Tocopherol is naturally found in foods and has proven antioxidant effects. Its primary role within the body is to neutralize oxidation and protect parts of the eye that are susceptible to oxidative damage. The body uses our pure and natural form of Vitamin E more efficiently and has higher bioavailability than its more common synthetic version.

items.desc: Helps prevent oxidation of LDL Cholesterol
items.expanded: Docosahexaenoic acid, or DHA, is a polyunsaturated omega-3 fatty acid (PUFA) found throughout the body. It's a central structural fat found in the brain and eye, accounting for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain and up to 93% of the omega-3 fats in specific parts of the retina. It is also a vital component of the heart. Numerous research studies confirm that everyone, from infants to adults to the elderly, can benefit from a regular intake of dietary DHA. DHA accounts for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain. Our DHA is a nutritional oil derived from the marine alga, Schizochytrium sp., a rich source of Omega-3 docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) with rosemary extract (flavoring). It is vegetarian and provides essential brain, eye, and heart health benefits. In addition, it contributes to the maintenance of normal vision.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of a healthy cardiovascular system
ScienceVideos.subtitle: We use natural science to benefit the cardiovascular system.
ScienceVideos.popupText:
Curcumin is derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant commonly called turmeric. Bruno MD delivers curcumin using Curcumin Phytosome, and it’s the #1 doctor-recommended curcumin formulation by the Cleveland Clinic because it works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body and contains the whole bouquet of curcuminoids.

Clinical results show that turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system by preventing or delaying the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. It can protect the heart from inflammation, regulate or help lower high blood pressure, restore antioxidant levels, and improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially when combined with exercise. Daily intake of curcumin has also been shown to reduce heart damage caused by kidney, help stop the formation of blood clots that cause strokes, and prevent cardiac hypertrophy from high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of heart health
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels.
ScienceVideos.popupText: Bergamot Phytosome is clinically proven to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels. It also helps govern metabolic conditions that increase the risk of heart disease, and TYPE II diabetes. Bergamot Phytosome optimizes the biological absorption of polyphenols, normally characterized by poor bioavailability.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy aging, heart & cardiovascular health, brain health, and all activities involving energetic expenditure
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote longevity and a more active lifestyle.
ScienceVideos.popupText: Coenzyme Q10 Phytosome delivers up to 116% higher CoQ10 levels vs. standard curcumin. CholestQ10 health benefits have been validated in more than 40 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled studies. CoQ10 is concentrated in organs with high energy requirements, like the heart, and supports ATP production and mitochondrial function, which are vital to heart health. A potent antioxidant, CoQ10 Phytosome also protects DNA from damage and promotes overall longevity. CoQ10 Phytosome® is delivered in a crystal-free liquid solution to maximize absorption.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy liver
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote a healthy liver
ScienceVideos.popupText: The active biophenols and flavonoids harvested from the endemic variety of Cardoon leaf we use (Cynara Cardunculus L. Var. AltilisDC and Scolymus) inhibit the creation of fatty lipids in the liver cells. Excessive accumulation of lipids in hepatocytes can lead to a condition called hepatic steatosis or fatty liver disease, which increases the risk of cardiovascular diseases such as atherosclerosis, heart attack, and stroke.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of preventing oxidation of LDL cholesterol
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to reduce the cause of atherosclerosis
ScienceVideos.popupText: Natural Vitamin E (d-alpha tocopheryl succinate) is a must-take nutrient for your heart. It helps prevent the oxidation of LDL Cholesterol. Research has shown that natural Vitamin E combined with CoQ10 helps maintain its antioxidant state. It also reduces lipid peroxidation levels — the pivotal reaction in the cause of atherosclerosis — and thus reduces the risk of cardiovascular disease.

ratings.name: Alyssa A. Lappen
ratings.subTitle: Great ingredients, but in what combination?
ratings.review:
This supplement has bilberry, the one ingredient here that is not included in my regular eye supplement, Areds2. I've read that bilberry has been used by the Navajo Nation for eye care for centuries, and that it works. That's why I decided to try this formula when it was offered through Amazon Vine. 
 Having said that, this supplement includes only a one month supply, and costs twice as much as the two-month supply I normally buy from a name brand pharmaceutical company whose product is tested and clinically proven for its stated purpose (which this one is not).
 The other thing that bothers me about this product, besides the price (which throws in an eye massage mask and a glitzy marketing brochure in an expensive gift box), is that the item lists its ingredients as being 229 mg overall, but its label does NOT list the exact amounts of each active ingredient. So one is denied the knowledge of how much of each active ingredient one is taking, whether it is too much vitamin E (or not enough), too much lutein (or not enough), and so on. 
 Unfortunately, that makes this item a no go for my future use. There are levels of certain ingredients that are required for eye care. And there are levels of certain ingredients that can be toxic.
 This "proprietary blend" does not list what you need to know. 
 Thus the company feels free to jack up the price, and it can prevent others from trying to "knock off"  its "special" formula. Maybe it also hoodwinks some into taking too much or too little of something they need. 
 I'll use the formula until it's gone, but I would not buy this again for the stated reasons. My eyes are too previous to play with the unknown. 
 Meanwhile I will try to find another standalone source of bilberry to add to my eye regimen and will also try to discover the optimal dosage for bilberry in eye care.

ratings.name: Siarhei and Maryna
ratings.subTitle: Looks strong and premium hopefully works just as well.
ratings.review:
Appearance and size (please see the video and photo):
- capsules do not look familiar, a little different from most capsules from other manufacturers;
- the size is +/- standard and capsules are easily swallowed;- I very strongly sniffed the air inside the glass jar in which the capsules come and felt a slight smell of blueberries.
I always study the contents of the capsules and this time was no exception. I opened the capsule and you can see it in the video. The content surprised me with its appearance, color and smell:
- inside a jelly-like mass in color resembling blood from a vein or clotted blood. Let's think it's blueberry jam. The contents were very viscous, sticky and would stick strongly to any surface. It wasn't tasty. It was not washed off either from the fingers or from the plate or from the knife just by a stream of water. In order to wash it off, I had to take a dish sponge. I washed it off the dishes, but my finger and nail were stained with this content and it didn't wash off immediately. In the photo you can see how my fingers look after I washed them with a dishwashing sponge;
- the contents of the capsule smell to me like the smell of fish oil. It was like the smell of the opened Fish oil capsule, but not so strong. My wife said that she can smell fish;
 I hope that what I saw and showed you is useful for us and is a combination of useful products.
 Buying any supplements, vitamins and so on, the most important thing is not to harm yourself and not buy any charlatan's product. Therefore, I always try to find out who makes the product. I liked what I learned about this company and the fact that the company has been in business for over 25 years.
 I am an Uber driver and I spend a lot of time behind the wheel, including in the dark. And of course I am no exception, and like most people I like to sit in front of a computer with a phone or tablet. Of course, all this puts a huge strain on the eyes. Therefore, I believe that it is very important to help your eyes, and for this you can do eye exercises and take the appropriate vitamins. Therefore, in my diet there are always blueberries as well as vitamin supplements.
 What I got with this product and what conclusion can I draw:
 - judging by the way the company cares about its image and presents its product, and as I said above, given the company's experience, I tend to trust their product;
 - I liked the bonus in the form of an eye mask. It's not an expensive feature, but nevertheless it's nice to get and useful to use.
 I have to be honest with you: after completing the course and drinking all the vitamins, I did not begin to see further better, and so on. You perfectly understand that miracles do not happen. But I am sure that I supported my eyes and gave them what we lack in our intense rhythm of life. I am sure that I should take care of my eyes and the whole body now so that later in a more mature age I would have fewer problems. 
 wish you all take care of your eyes and stay healthy! 
 Thanks for reading this review. If my comments were helpful, let me know. You can ask a question and someone from the community will definitely answer you and maybe it will be me.

ratings.name: majormusiclover
ratings.subTitle: Proprietary blend for the eyes
ratings.review: Serving - 2 = Bottle 30 servings. One in the am / pm w/food The label states the amount of only one ingredient, the rest is in a Bruno' MD proprietary blend. So it impossible to know if the ingredients one is seeking is here in a goodly amount. Judging by the vit E content I would expect this to be a good product in that the E is in natural form and a decent dosage.. ((( NATURAL VIT E = is labeled various ways = d-alpha tocopheral = d-alpha tocopheryl acetate = d-alpha tocopheryl succinate. >>> alpha tocopheryl is the most active biological form SYNTHETIC VIT E = forms are labeled with a dl prefix Both natural and synthetic tocopherols are subject to oxidation, and so in dietary supplements are esterified creating tocophphe tocopheryl acetate for stability purposes))) It's well documented that bilberry - Lutein & Zeaxanthin strongly support good eye health. And work better together than they do singularly. Bruno says their blend is protection and relief from CVS (Computer Vision Syndrome). which is a main reason I wanted to try this product. This is the fanciest / high end presentation of a vitamin I've ever seen. Comes in a strong cardboard box with 32 page booklet of thier products. And a complimentary (reusable eye mask that can be heated in the microwave or cooled in the freezer for hot / cold compresses for your eyes. If they gave the individual mg of each ingredient I be more inclined to give 5 stars

ratings.name: CorpGovNet
ratings.subTitle: Fantastic Box and Booklet
ratings.review:
This comes in such a box with such written pomp that you might think you were about to open a box containing a new phone or some hidden jewels. 
 Inside you get a nice brown bottle with a bright blue label containing supplements with some of the best ingredients Lutein, vitamin E, and Bilberry -- these are the usual ingredients in eye supplements. Perhaps the Bruno MD BlueRex Vision formula is a little purer than most. I didn't notice much if any difference. 
 What has helped my eyes just a bit is a set of yellow tinted clip-ons for my glasses that do seem to ease eye-strain when working at my computer all day.

ratings.name: Antigone Walsh
ratings.subTitle: The Eyes Have It
ratings.review: I use bilberry regularly and find it a tremendous help with night driving. Since the pandemic I have been spending even more time at the computer making my eyes tired and stressed. This supplement contains all the good stuff: bilberry, DHA, lutein, zeaxanthin and astaxanthin. Unfortunately the amount of each is not listed. Dosage is two a day. The soft gel caps are small and easy to swallow. I have suffered no ill effects from consumption. The supplement comes packaged in an attractive box. Along with thevbottle is a small sachet scented with essential oils. It can be heated or chilled. It has a drawstring bag. The plush cover can be removed and laundered. There is also a lavish brochure describing the product line. Seems lije a well made formulation.

ratings.name: inayat2012 on youtube
ratings.subTitle: Good for your eyes
ratings.review: Easy to swallow capsules, lutein and zeaxanthin, vitamin E, and Bilberry (something you don't see as often in eye formulations). These are supposed to be formulated specifically to help those who work on computers a lot. They certainly have the right formula. The issue is the price. At $55 for 30 days supply, I don't see these are going to do that well. People should realize that Heraclitus taught. Let you food be your medicine.

ratings.name: La Vida Loca YT Keeping Up With The Reviews
ratings.subTitle: Easy to swallow pills - wonderful ingredients
ratings.review:
This Bruno MD supplement arrived in a beautiful packaging, and as all other Bruno MD products, it included a lovely gift. I actually really like the gift, it’s hot/cold therapy eye mask. One of those things with little beads you can put in the fridge and chill before applying. I really love it, it’s perfect fit. As for the rest of the packaging, I would love to see something Earth friendly and biodegradable because, although beautiful, it’s a big waste.
 The bottle is amber glass and will ensure freshness of the product. It contains 30 easy to swallow pills. Serving is 2pills so there is 15 servings in the bottle. I have a severe eye strain and dryness due to many hours of screen time per day. 10 at least. I just started using this supplement so I will have to report back after I use it up, so far I am 3 days in and no noticeable change.

ratings.name: Leslie
ratings.subTitle: Good blend but no amounts of each supplement disclosed
ratings.review:
These pills contain lutein and zeaxanthin, two carotenoids found in the central macula of the eye, plus other antioxidents. 
 Research (AREDS2 study) shows that taking a product containing these two components can reverse damage in the center of the retina in people who have macular degeneration. This disease runs in my family, so my eye doctor has recommended I add these supplements to my daily diet as a preventative measure. 
 This seems like a fine blend, but I don't like that the amounts of lutein, zeaxanthin, and astaxanthin are not disclosed. Instead, it says proprietary complex. I know what amount of each I need and am not sure if that is what I am getting. I take a minimum of 12mg lutein and 4mg zeaxanthin every day. Also, the price is substantially higher than other brands with similar ingredients.

ratings.name: Johnny
ratings.subTitle: Pricey given the ingredients
ratings.review:
This vision supplement from Bruno MD most importantly contains Vitamin E. It can help lower the risk of macular degeneration and other age related eyecare conditions such as cataracts. Research indicates Vitamin E can help play a role in healthy visioncare. Bruno MD contains a quite high 1787% of the recommended daily value. Thus, it’s always a good idea to check with your physician before embarking on new supplementation.
 regarding the proprietary ingredients and blue light blocking claims: Lutein is also good for eye health yet the product doesn’t reveal how much is included. It’s most effective get a cheap pair of blue blocker glasses to be worn at least the last hour before bedtime. All of us have them in our house—they truly work well.

ratings.name: Michael Kerner
ratings.subTitle: Vision Aid
ratings.review: Personally, I like these pills for my vision, but they did not help in the way Nature's Bounty Lutein Blue did for me.

ratings.name: M. A. Ramos
ratings.subTitle: Easy to swallow
ratings.review: At this time I do not know how the antioxidants are working out at this time. Time will tell. But I like that they are easy to swallow and a great source of vitamin E. I hope as advertised that the product will provide protection from damaging effects of free radicals, working as light filters and as antioxidants in the eye. Lutein & Zeaxanthin in our blend. My eyes have been getting blurry and I hope prolonged use will be of aid.

ratings.name: CZ
ratings.subTitle: Decent suplement
ratings.review: Decent supplement, but I have used much less expensive ones that gave the same benefit. After taking these I did not notice anything different from when I take my normal eye supplement, that has the same ingredients at a much lower price point.

ratings.name: Wylee's mom
ratings.subTitle: Premium eye protection supplements
ratings.review: I have to say this company, Bruno MD, goes out of their way to package their products beautifully. The box their products arrive in a so sturdy and beautifully decorated I want to save the box! Also, a nice gift arrives with each product ordered and that's a nice surprise. So I ordered Blue Rex vision supplement for myself because I spend way to much time in front of my cell phone as well as my computer and I can really feel the strain on my eyes. This bottle of supplements contains a one month supply, I take one soft gel in the morning and one soft gel in the evening with food. The soft gels are small and easy to swallow, there is no taste. I feel these eye supplements are of superior quality based on the fact that there have been many positive studies done. I'm going to continue taking these Bruno MD eye supplements and my eyes are going to love me for it. Thank you for taking the time to read my review, I hope it was helpful.

ratings.name: RockyRoad
ratings.subTitle: Good Product, Packaging Overkill
ratings.review:
While one can't testify to it's effectiveness in a short 2 weeks, the list of ingredients in this blend are impressive.
 As a person just diagnosed with early macular degeneration,it has all the components that can help me keep my eyesight a bit longer.
  The packaging is a bit of overkill. Feels like I'm paying extra for a pretty box and a bottle snuggled in custom foam.
 That being said, I love one of the upscale perks, and that is the glass bottle. Safe, sanitary, easy to recycle..

ratings.name: V. Williams
ratings.subTitle: Impressive combination of extracts, herbs, and antioxidant supplement
ratings.review:
Bruno MD BlueRex Vision, Eye Health Supplement for Adults, Vitamin E and Bilberry Extracts, Vitamin E and Bilberry Extracts, Antioxidant Supplement, Helps with Computer Vision Syndrome
 I got these because I spend a LOT of time on the computer and noticed a real benefit to blue light protection, greatly easing eye strain. Also, I like healthy eye supplements, vitamins, and herbs and believe in their benefits. But this package came as a delightful surprise--a beautiful gift to myself, the box beautifully crafted to display the softgels Bluerex Vision bottle AND included a massage therapy eye mask--something my ophthalmologist just recommended! The supplements I'm taking and the associated eye care must work as I got a healthy report from the doc and I'm a senior. This is a product I can happily recommend.

ratings.name: Trelakopela
ratings.subTitle: Great eye Supplement.
ratings.review: Having to work a lot in front of a computer, my eyes get stained and sore, this vitamin actually helps take the strain and soreness away allowing me to work more easily and for longer periods of time. It helps with blue light protection, my vision is starting to Improve, good ingredients, and nicely packaged with surprise gift, Great product! Recommend it!

ratings.name: Phoenix
ratings.subTitle: Great list of supplements included
ratings.review:
I have experienced eye strain and am also aging and was asked by my eye doctor to add supplements to my diet in order to improve the health of my eyes. I like the list of supplements included in this pill and they are almost exactly the same as what I was recommended. I have been taking them for a month now, but have yet to go back to the eye doctor to see if there is any improvement, but there have also been no side effects. 
 Pros 
 Good quality, size and no after taste 
 Easy to swallow 
Cons 
 None noted

ratings.name: Darlaina Dancer
ratings.subTitle: Small and Fresh
ratings.review: This Bruno MD BlueRex Vision, Eye Health Supplement for Adults arrives in a very sturdy subscription box with a gift that is quite generous. These gelcaps are small and easy to swallow. They do not repeat on me. I hope my vision improves and this has great ingredients to help support with vision improvment.

ratings.name: K Hern
ratings.subTitle: Support eye health
ratings.review: As someone who is both 1) getting older and 2) on a computer all day and then a tablet or phone at night, I am quite concerned about my eye health. This supplement has all of the ingredients that are currently indicated for help with eye health and I am very pleased with it.

ratings.name: andiesenji
ratings.subTitle: Expensive but worth it
ratings.review:
I am very concerned about my 81-year-old eyes and have been taking supplements to protect them for years 
 These softgels are the easiest to take I have ever used. And I have no gastric upset following, which has been a problem with several supplements - annoying burping for a couple of hours. 
 These slide down easily, do not get hung up in my esophagus and no problems.

ratings.name: Squidslinger
ratings.subTitle: Pretty classy
ratings.review:
These definitely come in a classy box. Never received a supplement that was almost like receiving an expensive phone. Comes with a pamphlet too. Definitely something I don't see other companies send out. 
 Ordered this because my wife needed something for her eyes and she has tried some cheaper brands so, I figured it would be a good test to see if this expensive brand does any better. So far so good. Hasn't noted any drastic changes but, she also hasn't been complaining about her vision since taking it. Will update later after she's used it for awhile.

ratings.name: T Jones
ratings.subTitle: Great supplement
ratings.review: My vision is terribly compromised. I have been taking this product for less than a year and have noticed an increased ability to see at night, together with improvement to my all around vision. There are times in the morning when I actually see well enough with my one good eye, that I forget to put my glasses on. I intend to take this product for the rest of my life.

ratings.name: Carefree Retiree
ratings.subTitle: Great Eye Supplement
ratings.review: This seems like a high-quality supplement with all the major ingredients for good eye health. I take lutein, bilberry, and astaxanthin on a regular basis. I think eye health supplements are important in this day of constant screen-time.

items.title: Antioxidant Protection
items.body: Protects the eye from damaging free radicals
items.expanded: To protect the front of the eye, Bluerex contains pharma-grade Astaxanthin, the most potent antioxidant in nature. Astaxanthin is stronger than other antioxidants when combating singlet oxygen damage for eye health. Singlet oxygens are active oxygen species generated in human skin by exposure to ultraviolet radiation (UV) that causes eye damage. Bluerex Astaxanthin is 6000 times stronger than Vitamin C and 3000 times more potent than Resveratrol. Bluerex protects the back of the eye from free radical damage with Lutein and Zeaxanthin, which naturally increase MPOD (Macular Optical Pigment Density) levels inside your eye. This yellow pigmentation acts like internal sunglasses to filter high-energy blue light before it hits your macula.

Collagen.title: What is Cholesterol?
Collagen.description: Cholesterol is a waxy, fat-like substance found in your blood. It's crucial for building healthy cells and making hormones, but too much of it, especially the 'bad' type, can lead to health problems.
Collagen.popupText:
What is “bad” cholesterol?

There are two main types of cholesterol: HDL (High-Density Lipoprotein) and LDL (Low-Density Lipoprotein). Think of HDL as the 'good' cholesterol because it helps remove LDL from the arteries, reducing the risk of heart disease.

On the other hand, LDL is often called the 'bad' cholesterol because when there's too much of it, it can build up in the walls of your arteries, forming plaque. This buildup leads to atherosclerosis, which narrows the arteries and restricts blood flow.

Why We Need to Control It:

Controlling bad cholesterol is essential for maintaining good heart health. When LDL levels are high, it increases the risk of developing heart disease and stroke. Heart disease is one of the leading causes of death globally, so keeping your cholesterol levels in check is crucial for preventing these serious health issues.

CollagenPeptides.title: Why heart disease is rising and five simple habits to improve heart health.
CollagenPeptides.subTitle: Many countries offer programs to help individuals reduce their cholesterol and blood pressure.
CollagenPeptides.popupText:
Unfortunately, awareness alone won’t fix the growing prevalence of the Western diet. Even the best habits can’t overcome the negative impacts of the gradual move away from locally sourced nutrition and the Mediterranean-style diet toward highly processed fast food.

Five Simple Steps to a Healthier Heart-

  1. Healthy Diet: Eating a balanced diet low in saturated and trans fats can help lower LDL cholesterol. Focus on incorporating plenty of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins into your meals.
  2. Regular Exercise: Being physically active can raise HDL cholesterol levels and lower LDL cholesterol. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise most days of the week.
  3. Maintain a Healthy Weight: Being overweight or obese can increase LDL cholesterol levels. Losing even a small amount of weight can help improve your cholesterol profile.
  4. Limit Alcohol and Avoid Smoking: Excessive alcohol consumption can raise triglyceride levels and lead to high cholesterol. Smoking damages your blood vessels and increases the risk of heart disease.
  5. Supplement your diet: Natural ingredients can help manage cholesterol and keep it in the healthy range. The clinically proven, natural ingredients in CholestQ10® are delivered with Phytosome® Technology, which delivers hard-to-absorb ingredients into your bloodstream with up to 3000% more bioavailability.

items.expanded: Natural Astaxanthin, microalgae, accumulates Astaxanthin in lipid vesicles during periods of nutrient deficiency and environmental stress. Because this alga grows in places exposed to intense sunlight during its dormant phase, it has evolved to use Astaxanthin to protect the cell nucleus against free radicals generated by UV radiation. These potent anti-inflammatory properties provide front eye protection by alleviating oxidative stress and help reduce eye fatigue and strain, common symptoms of computer vision syndrome.
items.desc: Clinically proven to support a healthy inflammatory
Clinically proven to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels.
items.expanded: These all-natural compounds are harvested from marigold flowers and dramatically increase the macular pigments critical to filtering harmful blue light before it can damage your retina. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are clinically proven partners to help reduce the progression of specific eye issues throughout our lives. Lutein & Zeaxanthin are two types of ‘carotenoids’ found in food, mainly in vegetables and fruit. They play critical antioxidant functions within our body by guarding the eyes against the damaging effects of free radicals, working together for eye health and improved visual performance, and reducing the progression of certain eye conditions as we age.

items.desc: Promotes healthy aging, heart & cardiovascular health, brain health, and all activities involving energetic expenditure
items.expanded: Our Bilberry Fruit extract packs a potent compound of plant pigments called anthocyanins shown to promote healthy tear secretion, improve vision, increase retinal sensitivity (night vision), and help prevent common eye issues as we mature. We extract Bilberry from a fruit called ‘Vaccinium Myrtillus,’ grown in northern central Europe. Bluerex contains the only bilberry extract with properties demonstrated in more than 50 positive clinical & pharmacological studies, including at least 25 controlled or double-blind studies to have no side effects and showed an improvement in vascular health and support of healthy tears secretion. In addition, our standardized extract contains 36% anthocyanins validated by computerized perimetry to play an essential role in improving retinal sensitivity.

items.desc: Can inhibit fat accumulation in the hepatocytes (liver cells)
items.expanded: A select type of natural and pure Vitamin E, shown to help neutralize oxidative damage that leads to age-related vision problems. It has been shown to help subjects with moderate age-related macular degeneration. In addition, d-alpha-tocopherol reduced the risk of developing advanced age-related macular degeneration by 25% for subjects who already demonstrated early signs of macular degeneration. Vitamin E Natural Tocopherol is naturally found in foods and has proven antioxidant effects. Its primary role within the body is to neutralize oxidation and protect parts of the eye that are susceptible to oxidative damage. The body uses our pure and natural form of Vitamin E more efficiently and has higher bioavailability than its more common synthetic version.

items.desc: Helps prevent oxidation of LDL Cholesterol
items.expanded: Docosahexaenoic acid, or DHA, is a polyunsaturated omega-3 fatty acid (PUFA) found throughout the body. It's a central structural fat found in the brain and eye, accounting for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain and up to 93% of the omega-3 fats in specific parts of the retina. It is also a vital component of the heart. Numerous research studies confirm that everyone, from infants to adults to the elderly, can benefit from a regular intake of dietary DHA. DHA accounts for up to 97% of the total omega-3 fats in the brain. Our DHA is a nutritional oil derived from the marine alga, Schizochytrium sp., a rich source of Omega-3 docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) with rosemary extract (flavoring). It is vegetarian and provides essential brain, eye, and heart health benefits. In addition, it contributes to the maintenance of normal vision.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of a healthy cardiovascular system
ScienceVideos.subtitle: We use natural science to benefit the cardiovascular system.
ScienceVideos.popupText:
Curcumin is derived from the rhizome of Curcuma longa L., an East Indian plant commonly called turmeric. Bruno MD delivers curcumin using Curcumin Phytosome, and it’s the #1 doctor-recommended curcumin formulation by the Cleveland Clinic because it works through multiple pathways on multiple targets to provide complete relief throughout the body and contains the whole bouquet of curcuminoids.

Clinical results show that turmeric has several beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system by preventing or delaying the development of atherosclerosis in healthy people. It can protect the heart from inflammation, regulate or help lower high blood pressure, restore antioxidant levels, and improve age-related stiffening of blood vessels, especially when combined with exercise. Daily intake of curcumin has also been shown to reduce heart damage caused by kidney, help stop the formation of blood clots that cause strokes, and prevent cardiac hypertrophy from high blood pressure, heart attack, high salt intake, or diabetes.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of heart health
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels.
ScienceVideos.popupText: Bergamot Phytosome is clinically proven to protect against cardiovascular issues by supporting healthy cholesterol levels. It also helps govern metabolic conditions that increase the risk of heart disease, and TYPE II diabetes. Bergamot Phytosome optimizes the biological absorption of polyphenols, normally characterized by poor bioavailability.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy aging, heart & cardiovascular health, brain health, and all activities involving energetic expenditure
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote longevity and a more active lifestyle.
ScienceVideos.popupText: Coenzyme Q10 Phytosome delivers up to 116% higher CoQ10 levels vs. standard curcumin. CholestQ10 health benefits have been validated in more than 40 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled studies. CoQ10 is concentrated in organs with high energy requirements, like the heart, and supports ATP production and mitochondrial function, which are vital to heart health. A potent antioxidant, CoQ10 Phytosome also protects DNA from damage and promotes overall longevity. CoQ10 Phytosome® is delivered in a crystal-free liquid solution to maximize absorption.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of healthy liver
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to promote a healthy liver
ScienceVideos.popupText: The active biophenols and flavonoids harvested from the endemic variety of Cardoon leaf we use (Cynara Cardunculus L. Var. AltilisDC and Scolymus) inhibit the creation of fatty lipids in the liver cells. Excessive accumulation of lipids in hepatocytes can lead to a condition called hepatic steatosis or fatty liver disease, which increases the risk of cardiovascular diseases such as atherosclerosis, heart attack, and stroke.

ScienceVideos.title: The science of preventing oxidation of LDL cholesterol
ScienceVideos.subtitle: How we use science to reduce the cause of atherosclerosis
ScienceVideos.popupText: Natural Vitamin E (d-alpha tocopheryl succinate) is a must-take nutrient for your heart. It helps prevent the oxidation of LDL Cholesterol. Research has shown that natural Vitamin E combined with CoQ10 helps maintain its antioxidant state. It also reduces lipid peroxidation levels — the pivotal reaction in the cause of atherosclerosis — and thus reduces the risk of cardiovascular disease.
