ratings.name: Alyssa A. Lappen
ratings.subTitle: Great ingredients, but in what combination?
ratings.review:
This supplement has bilberry, the one ingredient here that is not included in my regular eye supplement, Areds2. I've read that bilberry has been used by the Navajo Nation for eye care for centuries, and that it works. That's why I decided to try this formula when it was offered through Amazon Vine. 
 Having said that, this supplement includes only a one month supply, and costs twice as much as the two-month supply I normally buy from a name brand pharmaceutical company whose product is tested and clinically proven for its stated purpose (which this one is not).
 The other thing that bothers me about this product, besides the price (which throws in an eye massage mask and a glitzy marketing brochure in an expensive gift box), is that the item lists its ingredients as being 229 mg overall, but its label does NOT list the exact amounts of each active ingredient. So one is denied the knowledge of how much of each active ingredient one is taking, whether it is too much vitamin E (or not enough), too much lutein (or not enough), and so on. 
 Unfortunately, that makes this item a no go for my future use. There are levels of certain ingredients that are required for eye care. And there are levels of certain ingredients that can be toxic.
 This "proprietary blend" does not list what you need to know. 
 Thus the company feels free to jack up the price, and it can prevent others from trying to "knock off"  its "special" formula. Maybe it also hoodwinks some into taking too much or too little of something they need. 
 I'll use the formula until it's gone, but I would not buy this again for the stated reasons. My eyes are too previous to play with the unknown. 
 Meanwhile I will try to find another standalone source of bilberry to add to my eye regimen and will also try to discover the optimal dosage for bilberry in eye care.

ratings.name: Siarhei and Maryna
ratings.subTitle: Looks strong and premium hopefully works just as well.
ratings.review:
Appearance and size (please see the video and photo):
- capsules do not look familiar, a little different from most capsules from other manufacturers;
- the size is +/- standard and capsules are easily swallowed;- I very strongly sniffed the air inside the glass jar in which the capsules come and felt a slight smell of blueberries.
I always study the contents of the capsules and this time was no exception. I opened the capsule and you can see it in the video. The content surprised me with its appearance, color and smell:
- inside a jelly-like mass in color resembling blood from a vein or clotted blood. Let's think it's blueberry jam. The contents were very viscous, sticky and would stick strongly to any surface. It wasn't tasty. It was not washed off either from the fingers or from the plate or from the knife just by a stream of water. In order to wash it off, I had to take a dish sponge. I washed it off the dishes, but my finger and nail were stained with this content and it didn't wash off immediately. In the photo you can see how my fingers look after I washed them with a dishwashing sponge;
- the contents of the capsule smell to me like the smell of fish oil. It was like the smell of the opened Fish oil capsule, but not so strong. My wife said that she can smell fish;
 I hope that what I saw and showed you is useful for us and is a combination of useful products.
 Buying any supplements, vitamins and so on, the most important thing is not to harm yourself and not buy any charlatan's product. Therefore, I always try to find out who makes the product. I liked what I learned about this company and the fact that the company has been in business for over 25 years.
 I am an Uber driver and I spend a lot of time behind the wheel, including in the dark. And of course I am no exception, and like most people I like to sit in front of a computer with a phone or tablet. Of course, all this puts a huge strain on the eyes. Therefore, I believe that it is very important to help your eyes, and for this you can do eye exercises and take the appropriate vitamins. Therefore, in my diet there are always blueberries as well as vitamin supplements.
 What I got with this product and what conclusion can I draw:
 - judging by the way the company cares about its image and presents its product, and as I said above, given the company's experience, I tend to trust their product;
 - I liked the bonus in the form of an eye mask. It's not an expensive feature, but nevertheless it's nice to get and useful to use.
 I have to be honest with you: after completing the course and drinking all the vitamins, I did not begin to see further better, and so on. You perfectly understand that miracles do not happen. But I am sure that I supported my eyes and gave them what we lack in our intense rhythm of life. I am sure that I should take care of my eyes and the whole body now so that later in a more mature age I would have fewer problems. 
 wish you all take care of your eyes and stay healthy! 
 Thanks for reading this review. If my comments were helpful, let me know. You can ask a question and someone from the community will definitely answer you and maybe it will be me.

ratings.name: majormusiclover
ratings.subTitle: Proprietary blend for the eyes
ratings.review: Serving - 2 = Bottle 30 servings. One in the am / pm w/food The label states the amount of only one ingredient, the rest is in a Bruno' MD proprietary blend. So it impossible to know if the ingredients one is seeking is here in a goodly amount. Judging by the vit E content I would expect this to be a good product in that the E is in natural form and a decent dosage.. ((( NATURAL VIT E = is labeled various ways = d-alpha tocopheral = d-alpha tocopheryl acetate = d-alpha tocopheryl succinate. >>> alpha tocopheryl is the most active biological form SYNTHETIC VIT E = forms are labeled with a dl prefix Both natural and synthetic tocopherols are subject to oxidation, and so in dietary supplements are esterified creating tocophphe tocopheryl acetate for stability purposes))) It's well documented that bilberry - Lutein & Zeaxanthin strongly support good eye health. And work better together than they do singularly. Bruno says their blend is protection and relief from CVS (Computer Vision Syndrome). which is a main reason I wanted to try this product. This is the fanciest / high end presentation of a vitamin I've ever seen. Comes in a strong cardboard box with 32 page booklet of thier products. And a complimentary (reusable eye mask that can be heated in the microwave or cooled in the freezer for hot / cold compresses for your eyes. If they gave the individual mg of each ingredient I be more inclined to give 5 stars

ratings.name: CorpGovNet
ratings.subTitle: Fantastic Box and Booklet
ratings.review:
This comes in such a box with such written pomp that you might think you were about to open a box containing a new phone or some hidden jewels. 
 Inside you get a nice brown bottle with a bright blue label containing supplements with some of the best ingredients Lutein, vitamin E, and Bilberry -- these are the usual ingredients in eye supplements. Perhaps the Bruno MD BlueRex Vision formula is a little purer than most. I didn't notice much if any difference. 
 What has helped my eyes just a bit is a set of yellow tinted clip-ons for my glasses that do seem to ease eye-strain when working at my computer all day.

ratings.name: Antigone Walsh
ratings.subTitle: The Eyes Have It
ratings.review: I use bilberry regularly and find it a tremendous help with night driving. Since the pandemic I have been spending even more time at the computer making my eyes tired and stressed. This supplement contains all the good stuff: bilberry, DHA, lutein, zeaxanthin and astaxanthin. Unfortunately the amount of each is not listed. Dosage is two a day. The soft gel caps are small and easy to swallow. I have suffered no ill effects from consumption. The supplement comes packaged in an attractive box. Along with thevbottle is a small sachet scented with essential oils. It can be heated or chilled. It has a drawstring bag. The plush cover can be removed and laundered. There is also a lavish brochure describing the product line. Seems lije a well made formulation.

ratings.name: inayat2012 on youtube
ratings.subTitle: Good for your eyes
ratings.review: Easy to swallow capsules, lutein and zeaxanthin, vitamin E, and Bilberry (something you don't see as often in eye formulations). These are supposed to be formulated specifically to help those who work on computers a lot. They certainly have the right formula. The issue is the price. At $55 for 30 days supply, I don't see these are going to do that well. People should realize that Heraclitus taught. Let you food be your medicine.

ratings.name: La Vida Loca YT Keeping Up With The Reviews
ratings.subTitle: Easy to swallow pills - wonderful ingredients
ratings.review:
This Bruno MD supplement arrived in a beautiful packaging, and as all other Bruno MD products, it included a lovely gift. I actually really like the gift, it’s hot/cold therapy eye mask. One of those things with little beads you can put in the fridge and chill before applying. I really love it, it’s perfect fit. As for the rest of the packaging, I would love to see something Earth friendly and biodegradable because, although beautiful, it’s a big waste.
 The bottle is amber glass and will ensure freshness of the product. It contains 30 easy to swallow pills. Serving is 2pills so there is 15 servings in the bottle. I have a severe eye strain and dryness due to many hours of screen time per day. 10 at least. I just started using this supplement so I will have to report back after I use it up, so far I am 3 days in and no noticeable change.

ratings.name: Leslie
ratings.subTitle: Good blend but no amounts of each supplement disclosed
ratings.review:
These pills contain lutein and zeaxanthin, two carotenoids found in the central macula of the eye, plus other antioxidents. 
 Research (AREDS2 study) shows that taking a product containing these two components can reverse damage in the center of the retina in people who have macular degeneration. This disease runs in my family, so my eye doctor has recommended I add these supplements to my daily diet as a preventative measure. 
 This seems like a fine blend, but I don't like that the amounts of lutein, zeaxanthin, and astaxanthin are not disclosed. Instead, it says proprietary complex. I know what amount of each I need and am not sure if that is what I am getting. I take a minimum of 12mg lutein and 4mg zeaxanthin every day. Also, the price is substantially higher than other brands with similar ingredients.

ratings.name: Johnny
ratings.subTitle: Pricey given the ingredients
ratings.review:
This vision supplement from Bruno MD most importantly contains Vitamin E. It can help lower the risk of macular degeneration and other age related eyecare conditions such as cataracts. Research indicates Vitamin E can help play a role in healthy visioncare. Bruno MD contains a quite high 1787% of the recommended daily value. Thus, it’s always a good idea to check with your physician before embarking on new supplementation.
 regarding the proprietary ingredients and blue light blocking claims: Lutein is also good for eye health yet the product doesn’t reveal how much is included. It’s most effective get a cheap pair of blue blocker glasses to be worn at least the last hour before bedtime. All of us have them in our house—they truly work well.

ratings.name: Michael Kerner
ratings.subTitle: Vision Aid
ratings.review: Personally, I like these pills for my vision, but they did not help in the way Nature's Bounty Lutein Blue did for me.

ratings.name: M. A. Ramos
ratings.subTitle: Easy to swallow
ratings.review: At this time I do not know how the antioxidants are working out at this time. Time will tell. But I like that they are easy to swallow and a great source of vitamin E. I hope as advertised that the product will provide protection from damaging effects of free radicals, working as light filters and as antioxidants in the eye. Lutein & Zeaxanthin in our blend. My eyes have been getting blurry and I hope prolonged use will be of aid.

ratings.name: CZ
ratings.subTitle: Decent suplement
ratings.review: Decent supplement, but I have used much less expensive ones that gave the same benefit. After taking these I did not notice anything different from when I take my normal eye supplement, that has the same ingredients at a much lower price point.

ratings.name: Wylee's mom
ratings.subTitle: Premium eye protection supplements
ratings.review: I have to say this company, Bruno MD, goes out of their way to package their products beautifully. The box their products arrive in a so sturdy and beautifully decorated I want to save the box! Also, a nice gift arrives with each product ordered and that's a nice surprise. So I ordered Blue Rex vision supplement for myself because I spend way to much time in front of my cell phone as well as my computer and I can really feel the strain on my eyes. This bottle of supplements contains a one month supply, I take one soft gel in the morning and one soft gel in the evening with food. The soft gels are small and easy to swallow, there is no taste. I feel these eye supplements are of superior quality based on the fact that there have been many positive studies done. I'm going to continue taking these Bruno MD eye supplements and my eyes are going to love me for it. Thank you for taking the time to read my review, I hope it was helpful.

ratings.name: RockyRoad
ratings.subTitle: Good Product, Packaging Overkill
ratings.review:
While one can't testify to it's effectiveness in a short 2 weeks, the list of ingredients in this blend are impressive.
 As a person just diagnosed with early macular degeneration,it has all the components that can help me keep my eyesight a bit longer.
  The packaging is a bit of overkill. Feels like I'm paying extra for a pretty box and a bottle snuggled in custom foam.
 That being said, I love one of the upscale perks, and that is the glass bottle. Safe, sanitary, easy to recycle..

ratings.name: V. Williams
ratings.subTitle: Impressive combination of extracts, herbs, and antioxidant supplement
ratings.review:
Bruno MD BlueRex Vision, Eye Health Supplement for Adults, Vitamin E and Bilberry Extracts, Vitamin E and Bilberry Extracts, Antioxidant Supplement, Helps with Computer Vision Syndrome
 I got these because I spend a LOT of time on the computer and noticed a real benefit to blue light protection, greatly easing eye strain. Also, I like healthy eye supplements, vitamins, and herbs and believe in their benefits. But this package came as a delightful surprise--a beautiful gift to myself, the box beautifully crafted to display the softgels Bluerex Vision bottle AND included a massage therapy eye mask--something my ophthalmologist just recommended! The supplements I'm taking and the associated eye care must work as I got a healthy report from the doc and I'm a senior. This is a product I can happily recommend.

ratings.name: Trelakopela
ratings.subTitle: Great eye Supplement.
ratings.review: Having to work a lot in front of a computer, my eyes get stained and sore, this vitamin actually helps take the strain and soreness away allowing me to work more easily and for longer periods of time. It helps with blue light protection, my vision is starting to Improve, good ingredients, and nicely packaged with surprise gift, Great product! Recommend it!

ratings.name: Phoenix
ratings.subTitle: Great list of supplements included
ratings.review:
I have experienced eye strain and am also aging and was asked by my eye doctor to add supplements to my diet in order to improve the health of my eyes. I like the list of supplements included in this pill and they are almost exactly the same as what I was recommended. I have been taking them for a month now, but have yet to go back to the eye doctor to see if there is any improvement, but there have also been no side effects. 
 Pros 
 Good quality, size and no after taste 
 Easy to swallow 
Cons 
 None noted

ratings.name: Darlaina Dancer
ratings.subTitle: Small and Fresh
ratings.review: This Bruno MD BlueRex Vision, Eye Health Supplement for Adults arrives in a very sturdy subscription box with a gift that is quite generous. These gelcaps are small and easy to swallow. They do not repeat on me. I hope my vision improves and this has great ingredients to help support with vision improvment.

ratings.name: K Hern
ratings.subTitle: Support eye health
ratings.review: As someone who is both 1) getting older and 2) on a computer all day and then a tablet or phone at night, I am quite concerned about my eye health. This supplement has all of the ingredients that are currently indicated for help with eye health and I am very pleased with it.

ratings.name: andiesenji
ratings.subTitle: Expensive but worth it
ratings.review:
I am very concerned about my 81-year-old eyes and have been taking supplements to protect them for years 
 These softgels are the easiest to take I have ever used. And I have no gastric upset following, which has been a problem with several supplements - annoying burping for a couple of hours. 
 These slide down easily, do not get hung up in my esophagus and no problems.

ratings.name: Squidslinger
ratings.subTitle: Pretty classy
ratings.review:
These definitely come in a classy box. Never received a supplement that was almost like receiving an expensive phone. Comes with a pamphlet too. Definitely something I don't see other companies send out. 
 Ordered this because my wife needed something for her eyes and she has tried some cheaper brands so, I figured it would be a good test to see if this expensive brand does any better. So far so good. Hasn't noted any drastic changes but, she also hasn't been complaining about her vision since taking it. Will update later after she's used it for awhile.

ratings.name: T Jones
ratings.subTitle: Great supplement
ratings.review: My vision is terribly compromised. I have been taking this product for less than a year and have noticed an increased ability to see at night, together with improvement to my all around vision. There are times in the morning when I actually see well enough with my one good eye, that I forget to put my glasses on. I intend to take this product for the rest of my life.

ratings.name: Carefree Retiree
ratings.subTitle: Great Eye Supplement
ratings.review: This seems like a high-quality supplement with all the major ingredients for good eye health. I take lutein, bilberry, and astaxanthin on a regular basis. I think eye health supplements are important in this day of constant screen-time.
